queries.question: Какие компании имеют средний расход более 10 тысяч?
queries.sql_query: SELECT c.CompanyName, AVG(f.Amount) AS AvgTransaction FROM Clients c JOIN Projects p ON c.ClientID = p.ClientID JOIN Finances f ON p.ProjectID = f.ProjectID WHERE f.Amount < 0 GROUP BY c.CompanyName HAVING AVG(f.Amount) < -10000;
queries.gpt-4o_response:
SELECT c.CompanyName, AVG(f.Amount) AS AverageExpense
FROM Clients c
JOIN Projects p ON c.ClientID = p.ClientID
JOIN Finances f ON p.ProjectID = f.ProjectID
WHERE f.TransactionType LIKE 'Расходы%'
GROUP BY c.CompanyName
HAVING AVG(f.Amount) > 10000;
queries.gpt-4o_response_ru:
SELECT c.CompanyName, AVG(f.Amount) AS AverageExpense
FROM Clients c
JOIN Contracts ct ON c.ClientID = ct.ClientID
JOIN Finances f ON ct.ProjectID = f.ProjectID
WHERE f.Amount < 0
GROUP BY c.CompanyName
HAVING AVG(f.Amount) < -10000;
queries.google/gemini-2.0-flash-001_response:
SELECT c.CompanyName
FROM Clients c
JOIN Contracts ct ON c.ClientID = ct.ClientID
GROUP BY c.CompanyName
HAVING AVG(ct.Amount) > 10000;
queries.google/gemini-2.0-flash-001_response_ru:
SELECT 
    s.SupplierName
FROM 
    Suppliers s
JOIN 
    Materials m ON s.SupplierID = m.SupplierID
GROUP BY 
    s.SupplierName
HAVING 
    AVG(m.CostPerUnit * (1 - (CAST(m.QuantityInStock AS DECIMAL(10,2))/(m.QuantityInStock + 1)))) > 10000;
queries.meta-llama/llama-3.3-70b-instruct_respon:
SELECT c.CompanyName, AVG(f.Amount) AS Средний_расход 
FROM Clients c 
JOIN Contracts con ON c.ClientID = con.ClientID 
JOIN Finances f ON con.ProjectID = f.ProjectID 
WHERE f.TransactionType = 'Расходы' 
GROUP BY c.CompanyName

queries.question: Какие проекты имеют более одного действующего разрешения и успешную инспекцию, при этом их бюджет превышает средний бюджет по всем проектам? Показать топ-4 результата.
queries.sql_query: SELECT p.ProjectName, p.Budget, COUNT(pe.PermitID) AS PermitCount FROM Projects p JOIN Permits pe ON p.ProjectID = pe.ProjectID JOIN Inspections i ON p.ProjectID = i.ProjectID WHERE pe.Status = 'Действующий' AND i.Result = 'Успешно' AND p.Budget > (SELECT AVG(Budget) FROM Projects) GROUP BY p.ProjectName, p.Budget HAVING COUNT(pe.PermitID) > 1 ORDER BY p.Budget DESC LIMIT 4;
queries.gpt-4o_response:
WITH ActivePermits AS (
    SELECT ProjectID, COUNT(PermitID) AS ActivePermitCount
    FROM Permits
    WHERE Status = 'Действующий'
    GROUP BY ProjectID
    HAVING COUNT(PermitID) > 1
),
SuccessfulInspections AS (
    SELECT ProjectID
    FROM Inspections
    WHERE Result = 'Успешно'
    GROUP BY ProjectID
),
AverageBudget AS (
    SELECT AVG(Budget) AS AvgBudget
    FROM Projects
)
SELECT p.ProjectName, p.Budget, p.Location, a.FirstName AS ArchitectFirstName, a.LastName AS ArchitectLastName, c.FirstName AS ClientFirstName, c.LastName AS ClientLastName
FROM Projects p
JOIN ActivePermits ap ON p.ProjectID = ap.ProjectID
JOIN SuccessfulInspections si ON p.ProjectID = si.ProjectID
JOIN AverageBudget ab ON p.Budget > ab.AvgBudget
JOIN Architects a ON p.ArchitectID = a.ArchitectID
JOIN Clients c ON p.ClientID = c.ClientID
ORDER BY p.Budget DESC
LIMIT 4;
queries.gpt-4o_response_ru:
SELECT 
    p.ProjectName, 
    p.Budget, 
    COUNT(DISTINCT pe.PermitID) AS ActivePermitsCount, 
    i.InspectionDate, 
    i.Result
FROM 
    Projects p
JOIN 
    Permits pe ON p.ProjectID = pe.ProjectID
JOIN 
    Inspections i ON p.ProjectID = i.ProjectID
WHERE 
    pe.Status = 'Действующий' 
    AND i.Result = 'Успешно'
GROUP BY 
    p.ProjectID, p.ProjectName, p.Budget, i.InspectionDate, i.Result
HAVING 
    COUNT(DISTINCT pe.PermitID) > 1 
    AND p.Budget > (SELECT AVG(Budget) FROM Projects)
ORDER BY 
    p.Budget DESC
LIMIT 4;
queries.google/gemini-2.0-flash-001_response:
SELECT 
    p.ProjectName,
    COUNT(DISTINCT pe.PermitID) AS NumberOfActivePermits,
    i.Result,
    p.Budget
FROM 
    Projects p
JOIN 
    Permits pe ON p.ProjectID = pe.ProjectID
JOIN

) equ ON pr.ProjectID = equ.ProjectID
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT ProjectID
    FROM Permits
    WHERE Status = 'Действующий'
) per ON pr.ProjectID = per.ProjectID
ORDER BY pr.Budget DESC
LIMIT 4;

queries.question: Какие проекты имеют более одного действующего разрешения, успешные инспекции и используют материалы с качеством выше 8? Показать топ-4 по общей стоимости материалов.
queries.sql_query: SELECT p.ProjectName, COUNT(DISTINCT pe.PermitID) AS PermitCount, COUNT(DISTINCT i.InspectionID) AS SuccessfulInspections, SUM(m.CostPerUnit * m.QuantityInStock) AS TotalMaterialCost FROM Projects p JOIN Permits pe ON p.ProjectID = pe.ProjectID JOIN Inspections i ON p.ProjectID = i.ProjectID JOIN Materials m ON m.QualityRating > 8 WHERE pe.Status = 'Действующий' AND i.Result = 'Успешно' GROUP BY p.ProjectName HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT pe.PermitID) > 1 AND COUNT(DISTINCT i.InspectionID) > 0 ORDER BY TotalMaterialCost DESC LIMIT 4;
queries.gpt-4o_response:
WITH ActivePermits AS (
    SELECT ProjectID
    FROM Permits
    WHERE Status = 'Действующий'
    GROUP BY ProjectID
    HAVING COUNT(PermitID) > 1
),
SuccessfulInspections AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT ProjectID
    FROM Inspections
    WHERE Result = 'Успешно'
),
HighQualityMaterials AS (
    SELECT m.MaterialID, m.CostPerUnit * m.QuantityInStock AS TotalMaterialCost
    FROM Materials m
    WHERE m.QualityRating > 8
),
ProjectMaterialCosts AS (
    SELECT p.ProjectID, SUM(hqm.TotalMaterialCost) AS TotalMaterialCost
    FROM Projects p
    JOIN Buildings b ON p.ProjectID = b.ProjectID
    JOIN HighQualityMaterials hqm ON b.Material = hqm.MaterialID
    GROUP BY p.ProjectID
)
SELECT p.ProjectID, p.ProjectName, p.Budget, pmc.TotalMaterialCost
FROM Projects p
JOIN ActivePermits ap ON p.ProjectID = ap.ProjectID
JOIN SuccessfulInspections si ON p.ProjectID = si.ProjectID
JOIN ProjectMaterialCosts pmc ON p.ProjectID = pmc.ProjectID
ORDER BY pmc.TotalMaterialCost DESC
LIMIT 4;

WITH ProjectPermits AS (
  SELECT p.ProjectID, COUNT(pr.PermitID) AS PermitCount
  FROM Projects p
  JOIN Permits pr ON p.ProjectID = pr.ProjectID
  WHERE pr.Status = 'Действующий'
  GROUP BY p.ProjectID
),
ProjectInspections AS (
  SELECT p.ProjectID, COUNT(i.InspectionID) AS InspectionCount
  FROM Projects p
  JOIN Inspections i ON p.ProjectID = i.ProjectID
  WHERE i.Result = 'Успешно'
  GROUP BY p.ProjectID
),
ProjectMaterials AS (
  SELECT p.ProjectID, SUM(m.CostPerUnit * m.QuantityInStock) AS MaterialCost
  FROM Projects p
  JOIN Buildings b ON p.ProjectID = b.ProjectID
  JOIN Materials m ON b.Material = m.MaterialName
  WHERE m.QualityRating > 8
  GROUP BY p.ProjectID
)
SELECT 
  p.ProjectName, 
  p.Budget, 
  pp.PermitCount, 
  pi.InspectionCount, 
  pm.MaterialCost
FROM Projects p
JOIN ProjectPermits pp ON p.ProjectID = pp.ProjectID
JOIN ProjectInspections pi ON p.ProjectID = pi.ProjectID
JOIN ProjectMaterials pm ON p.ProjectID = pm.ProjectID
WHERE pp.PermitCount > 1 AND pi.InspectionCount > 0
ORDER BY pm.MaterialCost DESC
LIMIT 4;

SELECT 
    p.ProjectName, 
    COUNT(DISTINCT pe.PermitID) AS PermitCount, 
    COUNT(DISTINCT i.InspectionID) AS InspectionCount, 
    SUM(m.CostPerUnit * m.QuantityInStock) AS TotalMaterialCost
FROM

queries.sql_query: SELECT p.ProjectName, p.Budget, COUNT(DISTINCT i.InspectionID) AS SuccessfulInspections, SUM(e.Cost) AS TotalEquipmentCost FROM Projects p JOIN Equipment e ON e.Status = 'в эксплуатации' JOIN Inspections i ON p.ProjectID = i.ProjectID JOIN Materials m ON m.QualityRating > 8 WHERE e.Cost > 800000 AND i.Result = 'Успешно' GROUP BY p.ProjectName, p.Budget HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT i.InspectionID) > 0 ORDER BY p.Budget DESC, SuccessfulInspections DESC LIMIT 5;

    p.Budget,
    COUNT(DISTINCT i.InspectionID) AS SuccessfulInspections,

queries.sql_query: SELECT a.FirstName, a.LastName, a.YearsOfExperience, COUNT(DISTINCT p.ProjectID) AS ProjectCount, COUNT(DISTINCT aw.AwardID) AS AwardCount FROM Architects a JOIN Projects p ON a.ArchitectID = p.ArchitectID JOIN Designs d ON p.ProjectID = d.ProjectID JOIN Awards aw ON a.ArchitectID = aw.ArchitectID WHERE a.YearsOfExperience > 25 AND aw.Year > 2011 AND d.Style IN ('Современный', 'Классический') AND p.Budget > 180000000 GROUP BY a.FirstName, a.LastName, a.YearsOfExperience HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT p.ProjectID) > 0 ORDER BY ProjectCount DESC, AwardCount DESC LIMIT 3;

queries.question: Какие проекты имеют соотношение бюджета к количеству успешных инспекций выше среднего по всем проектам, и при этом используют материалы с самым высоким рейтингом качества? Показать топ-6 проектов с детализацией расходов и состояния разрешений. [Ожидаемые колонки: Название проекта, Бюджет, Количество инспекций, Соотношение бюджета к инспекциям, Максимальное качество материалов, Количество разрешений, Статус разрешений, Общие расходы]
queries.sql_query: WITH ProjectMetrics AS (SELECT p.ProjectID, p.ProjectName, p.Budget, COUNT(DISTINCT i.InspectionID) AS InspectionCount, p.Budget / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT i.InspectionID), 0) AS BudgetPerInspection, MAX(m.QualityRating) AS MaxMaterialQuality, COUNT(DISTINCT pe.PermitID) AS PermitCount FROM Projects p LEFT JOIN Inspections i ON p.ProjectID = i.ProjectID AND i.Result = 'Успешно' LEFT JOIN Materials m ON m.QualityRating IS NOT NULL LEFT JOIN Permits pe ON p.ProjectID = pe.ProjectID GROUP BY p.ProjectID, p.ProjectName, p.Budget), AvgMetrics AS (SELECT AVG(BudgetPerInspection) AS AvgBudgetPerInspection, AVG(MaxMaterialQuality) AS AvgMaxMaterialQuality FROM ProjectMetrics) SELECT pm.ProjectName, pm.Budget, pm.InspectionCount, pm.BudgetPerInspection, pm.MaxMaterialQuality, pm.PermitCount, CASE WHEN pe.Status = 'Действующий' THEN 'Активно' WHEN pe.Status = 'Ожидает проверки' THEN 'В процессе' ELSE 'Не активно' END AS PermitStatus, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN f.Amount < 0 THEN ABS(f.Amount) ELSE 0 END), 0) AS TotalExpenses FROM ProjectMetrics pm JOIN Projects p ON pm.ProjectID = p.ProjectID LEFT JOIN Permits pe ON p.ProjectID = pe.ProjectID LEFT JOIN Finances f ON p.ProjectID = f.ProjectID, AvgMetrics WHERE pm.BudgetPerInspection > AvgMetrics.AvgBudgetPerInspection AND pm.MaxMaterialQuality = (SELECT MAX(QualityRating) FROM Materials) GROUP BY pm.ProjectName, pm.Budget, pm.InspectionCount, pm.BudgetPerInspection, pm.MaxMaterialQuality, pm.PermitCount, pe.Status ORDER BY pm.BudgetPerInspection DESC, TotalExpenses DESC LIMIT 6;
queries.gpt-4o_response:
WITH ProjectInspectionStats AS (
    SELECT 
        p.ProjectID,
        p.ProjectName,
        p.Budget,
        COUNT(i.InspectionID) AS SuccessfulInspections,
        CASE WHEN COUNT(i.InspectionID) > 0 THEN p.Budget / COUNT(i.InspectionID) ELSE 0 END AS BudgetToInspectionRatio
    FROM 
        Projects p
    LEFT JOIN 
        Inspections i ON p.ProjectID = i.ProjectID AND i.Result = 'Успешно'
    GROUP BY 
        p.ProjectID, p.ProjectName, p.Budget
),
AverageBudgetToInspection AS (
    SELECT 
        AVG(BudgetToInspectionRatio) AS AvgBudgetToInspectionRatio
    FROM 
        ProjectInspectionStats
),
TopQualityMaterials AS (
    SELECT 
        MAX(m.QualityRating) AS MaxQualityRating
    FROM 
        Materials m
),
ProjectMaterialQuality AS (
    SELECT 
        p.ProjectID,
        MAX(m.QualityRating) AS MaxMaterialQuality
    FROM 
        Projects p
    JOIN 
        Buildings b ON p.ProjectID = b.ProjectID
    JOIN 
        Materials m ON b.Material = m.MaterialName
    GROUP BY 
        p.ProjectID
),
PermitStats AS (
    SELECT 
        p.ProjectID,
        COUNT(pe.PermitID) AS PermitCount,
        GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT pe.Status) AS PermitStatuses
    FROM 
        Projects p
    LEFT JOIN 
        Permits pe ON p.ProjectID = pe.ProjectID
    GROUP BY 
        p.ProjectID
),
ProjectExpenses AS (
    SELECT 
        f.ProjectID,
        SUM(CASE WHEN f.Amount < 0 THEN -f.Amount ELSE 0 END) AS TotalExpenses
    FROM 
        Finances f
    GROUP BY 
        f.ProjectID
)
SELECT 
    pis.ProjectName,
    pis.Budget,
    pis.SuccessfulInspections,
    pis.BudgetToInspectionRatio,
    pmq.MaxMaterialQuality,
    ps.PermitCount,
    ps.PermitStatuses,
    pe.TotalExpenses
FROM 
    ProjectInspectionStats pis
JOIN 
    AverageBudgetToInspection abi ON pis.BudgetToInspectionRatio > abi.AvgBudgetToInspectionRatio
JOIN 
    ProjectMaterialQuality pmq ON pis.ProjectID = pmq.ProjectID
JOIN 
    TopQualityMaterials tqm ON pmq.MaxMaterialQuality = tqm.MaxQualityRating
LEFT JOIN 
    PermitStats ps ON pis.ProjectID = ps.ProjectID
LEFT JOIN 
    ProjectExpenses pe ON pis.ProjectID = pe.ProjectID
ORDER BY 
    pis.BudgetToInspectionRatio DESC
LIMIT 6;
queries.gpt-4o_response_ru:
WITH AvgBudgetToInspections AS (
    SELECT AVG(p.Budget / NULLIF(COUNT(i.InspectionID), 0)) AS AvgRatio
    FROM Projects p
    LEFT JOIN Inspections i ON p.ProjectID = i.ProjectID
    GROUP BY p.ProjectID
),
ProjectStats AS (
    SELECT 
        p.ProjectID,
        p.ProjectName,
        p.Budget,
        COUNT(i.InspectionID) AS InspectionCount,
        p.Budget / NULLIF(COUNT(i.InspectionID), 0) AS BudgetToInspectionsRatio,
        MAX(m.QualityRating) AS MaxMaterialQuality,
        COUNT(DISTINCT pe.PermitID) AS PermitCount,
        GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT pe.Status) AS PermitStatuses,
        SUM(CASE WHEN f.TransactionType LIKE 'Расходы%' THEN f.Amount ELSE 0 END) AS TotalExpenses
    FROM Projects p
    LEFT JOIN Inspections i ON p.ProjectID = i.ProjectID AND i.Result = 'Успешно'
    LEFT JOIN Buildings b ON p.ProjectID = b.ProjectID
    LEFT JOIN Materials m ON b.Material = m.MaterialName
    LEFT JOIN Permits pe ON p.ProjectID = pe.ProjectID
    LEFT JOIN Finances f ON p.ProjectID = f.ProjectID
    GROUP BY p.ProjectID
),
FilteredProjects AS (
    SELECT 
        ps.ProjectID,
        ps.ProjectName,
        ps.Budget,
        ps.InspectionCount,
        ps.BudgetToInspectionsRatio,
        ps.MaxMaterialQuality,
        ps.PermitCount,
        ps.PermitStatuses,
        ps.TotalExpenses
    FROM ProjectStats ps, AvgBudgetToInspections abi
    WHERE ps.BudgetToInspectionsRatio > abi.AvgRatio
    AND ps.MaxMaterialQuality = (SELECT MAX(QualityRating) FROM Materials)
)
SELECT 
    ProjectName AS Название_проекта,
    Budget AS Бюджет,
    InspectionCount AS Количество_инспекций,
    BudgetToInspectionsRatio AS Соотношение_бюджета_к_инспекциям,
    MaxMaterialQuality AS Максимальное_качество_материалов,
    PermitCount AS Количество_разрешений,
    PermitStatuses AS Статус_разрешений,
    TotalExpenses AS Общие_расходы
FROM FilteredProjects
ORDER BY BudgetToInspectionsRatio DESC
LIMIT 6;

WITH ProjectInspectionCounts AS (
    SELECT
        ProjectID,
        COUNT(InspectionID) AS InspectionCount
    FROM Inspections
    WHERE Result = 'Успешно'
    GROUP BY ProjectID
),
MaterialQuality AS (
    SELECT
        b.ProjectID,
        MAX(m.QualityRating) AS MaxQualityRating
    FROM Buildings b
    JOIN Projects p ON b.ProjectID = p.ProjectID
    JOIN Materials m ON b.Material = m.MaterialName
    GROUP BY b.ProjectID
),
ProjectFinances AS (
    SELECT
        ProjectID,
        SUM(Amount) AS TotalExpenses
    FROM Finances
    WHERE TransactionType LIKE '%Расходы%'
    GROUP BY ProjectID
),
PermitStatuses AS (
    SELECT
        ProjectID,
        COUNT(PermitID) AS PermitCount,
        GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT Status) AS PermitStatuses
    FROM Permits
    GROUP BY ProjectID
),
ProjectRatios AS (
    SELECT
        p.ProjectID,
        p.ProjectName,
        p.Budget,
        COALESCE(pic.InspectionCount, 0) AS InspectionCount,
        CASE
            WHEN COALESCE(pic.InspectionCount, 0) = 0 THEN 0
            ELSE p.Budget / COALESCE(pic.InspectionCount, 0)
        END AS BudgetToInspectionRatio,
        COALESCE(mq.MaxQualityRating, 0) AS MaxQualityRating,
        COALESCE(pf.TotalExpenses, 0) AS TotalExpenses,
        COALESCE(ps.PermitCount, 0) AS PermitCount,
        COALESCE(ps.PermitStatuses, 'N/A') AS PermitStatuses
    FROM Projects p
    LEFT JOIN ProjectInspectionCounts pic ON p.ProjectID = pic.ProjectID
    LEFT JOIN MaterialQuality mq ON p.ProjectID = mq.ProjectID
    LEFT JOIN ProjectFinances pf ON p.ProjectID = pf.ProjectID
    LEFT JOIN PermitStatuses ps ON p.ProjectID = ps.ProjectID
),
AverageRatio AS (
    SELECT AVG(BudgetToInspectionRatio) AS AvgBudgetToInspectionRatio FROM ProjectRatios
)
SELECT
    pr.ProjectName AS Название_проекта,
    pr.Budget AS Бюджет,
    pr.InspectionCount AS Количество_инспекций,
    pr.BudgetToInspectionRatio AS Соотношение_бюджета_к_инспекциям,
    pr.MaxQualityRating AS Максимальное_качество_материалов,
    pr.PermitCount AS Количество_разрешений,
    pr.PermitStatuses AS Статус_разрешений,
    pr.TotalExpenses AS Общие_расходы
FROM ProjectRatios pr
JOIN AverageRatio ar ON 1=1
WHERE pr.BudgetToInspectionRatio > ar.AvgBudgetToInspectionRatio
AND pr.MaxQualityRating = (SELECT MAX(MaxQualityRating) FROM ProjectRatios)
ORDER BY pr.BudgetToInspectionRatio DESC
LIMIT 6;

PermitStatus AS (
  SELECT p.ProjectID, COUNT(PermitID) AS PermitCount, 
         CASE 
           WHEN COUNT(CASE WHEN Status = 'Действующий' THEN 1 END) > 0 THEN 'Действующие'
           WHEN COUNT(CASE WHEN Status = 'Ожидает проверки' THEN 1 END) > 0 THEN 'Ожидает проверки'
           WHEN COUNT(CASE WHEN Status = 'Одобрено' THEN 1 END) > 0 THEN 'Одобрено'
           ELSE 'Отменен'
         END AS PermitStatus
  FROM Projects p
  JOIN Permits pe ON p.ProjectID = pe.ProjectID
  GROUP BY p.ProjectID
),
FinanceExpenses AS (
  SELECT f.ProjectID, SUM(f.Amount) AS TotalExpenses
  FROM Finances f
  WHERE f.TransactionType = 'Расходы на материалы'
  GROUP BY f.ProjectID
)
SELECT 
  pb.ProjectName, 
  pb.Budget, 
  si.SuccessfulInspectionCount, 
  pb.Budget / si.SuccessfulInspectionCount AS BudgetToInspectionRatio,
  pm.MaxMaterialQuality, 
  ps.PermitCount, 
  ps.PermitStatus, 
  fe.TotalExpenses
FROM ProjectBudgets pb
JOIN SuccessfulInspections si ON pb.ProjectID = si.ProjectID
JOIN ProjectMaterials pm ON pb.ProjectID = pm.ProjectID
JOIN PermitStatus ps ON pb.ProjectID = ps.ProjectID
JOIN FinanceExpenses fe ON pb.ProjectID = fe.ProjectID
WHERE pm.MaxMaterialQuality = (SELECT MAX(QualityRating) FROM Materials)
AND pb.Budget / si.SuccessfulInspectionCount > (SELECT AVG(Budget / SuccessfulInspectionCount) 
                                               FROM ProjectBudgets pb
                                               JOIN SuccessfulInspections si ON pb.ProjectID = si.ProjectID)
ORDER BY BudgetToInspectionRatio DESC
LIMIT 6;

WITH SuccessfulInspections AS (
    SELECT ProjectID, COUNT(InspectionID) AS SuccessfulInspectionCount
    FROM Inspections
    WHERE Result = 'Успешно'
    GROUP BY ProjectID
),
ProjectBudgetInspections AS (
    SELECT p.ProjectID, p.ProjectName, p.Budget, COALESCE(si.SuccessfulInspectionCount, 0) AS SuccessfulInspectionCount
    FROM Projects p
    LEFT JOIN SuccessfulInspections si ON p.ProjectID = si.ProjectID
),
BestMaterials AS (
    SELECT m.MaterialID, m.MaterialName, m.QualityRating
    FROM Materials m
    ORDER BY m.QualityRating DESC
    LIMIT 1
),
ProjectMaterials AS (
    SELECT p.ProjectID, p.ProjectName, p.Budget, COALESCE(si.SuccessfulInspectionCount, 0) AS SuccessfulInspectionCount,
           COALESCE(bm.MaterialName, '') AS BestMaterialName, COALESCE(bm.QualityRating, 0) AS BestMaterialQualityRating
    FROM Projects p
    LEFT JOIN SuccessfulInspections si ON p.ProjectID = si.ProjectID
    LEFT JOIN BestMaterials bm ON 1 = 1
),
ProjectPermits AS (
    SELECT p.ProjectID, COUNT(pr.PermitID) AS PermitCount,
           CASE WHEN COUNT(pr.PermitID) > 0 THEN 'Действующие' ELSE 'Отсутствуют' END AS PermitStatus
    FROM Projects p
    LEFT JOIN Permits pr ON p.ProjectID = pr.ProjectID
    GROUP BY p.ProjectID
),
ProjectExpenses AS (
    SELECT f.ProjectID, SUM(f.Amount) AS TotalExpenses
    FROM Finances f
    WHERE f.TransactionType = 'Расходы'
    GROUP BY f.ProjectID
)
SELECT pm.ProjectName, pm.Budget, pm.SuccessfulInspectionCount,
       CASE WHEN pm.SuccessfulInspectionCount > 0 THEN pm.Budget / pm.SuccessfulInspectionCount ELSE 0 END AS BudgetToInspectionRatio,
       pm.BestMaterialQualityRating, pp.PermitCount, pp.PermitStatus, COALESCE(pe.TotalExpenses, 0) AS TotalExpenses
FROM ProjectMaterials pm
JOIN ProjectPermits pp ON pm.ProjectID = pp.ProjectID
LEFT JOIN ProjectExpenses pe ON pm.ProjectID = pe.ProjectID

    FROM Projects p
    LEFT JOIN SuccessfulInspections si ON p.ProjectID = si.ProjectID
) t)
ORDER BY BudgetToInspectionRatio DESC

),
ProjectMaterialQuality AS (

    JOIN

    GROUP BY

),
ProjectPermits AS (
    SELECT 
        ProjectID,
        COUNT(*) AS PermitCount,
        GROUP_CONCAT(Status) AS PermitStatuses
    FROM 
        Permits
    GROUP BY 
        ProjectID
),
ProjectExpenses AS (
    SELECT 
        ProjectID,
        SUM(Amount) AS TotalExpenses
    FROM 
        Finances
    WHERE 
        TransactionType LIKE '%Расходы%'
    GROUP BY 
        ProjectID
),
ProjectStats AS (
    SELECT 
        p.ProjectID,
        p.ProjectName,
        p.Budget,
        COALESCE(si.InspectionCount, 0) AS InspectionCount,
        CASE 
            WHEN COALESCE(si.InspectionCount, 0) = 0 THEN NULL
            ELSE p.Budget / COALESCE(si.InspectionCount, 0)
        END AS BudgetToInspectionRatio,
        pmq.MaxMaterialQuality,
        COALESCE(pp.PermitCount, 0) AS PermitCount,
        COALESCE(pp.PermitStatuses, 'Нет разрешений') AS PermitStatuses,

    FROM 
        Projects p
    LEFT JOIN

),

        pr.ProjectID,
        pr.ProjectName,
        pr.Budget,
        COUNT(i.InspectionID) FILTER(WHERE i.Result = 'Успешно') AS NumSuccessfulInspections,
        MAX(m.QualityRating) AS MaxQualityRating,
        COUNT(DISTINCT pe.PermitID) AS NumPermits,
        STRING_AGG(pe.Status, ', ') AS PermitStatuses,
        SUM(f.Amount) AS TotalExpenses
    FROM

    LEFT JOIN

    LEFT JOIN

    LEFT JOIN

    LEFT JOIN

    LEFT JOIN

    GROUP BY 
        pr.ProjectID, pr.ProjectName, pr.Budget
),
AverageBudgetToInspectionRatio AS (

    FROM

SELECT

    pd.Budget AS Бюджет,
    pd.NumSuccessfulInspections AS КоличествоИнспекций,

queries.question: Какие архитекторы входят в топ-10% по опыту работы, при этом имеют награды после 2012 года и руководят проектами, по которым процент успешных инспекций составляет не менее 80%? Показать топ-4 архитекторов с рейтингом их эффективности. [Ожидаемые колонки: Имя, Фамилия, Стаж работы, Специализация, Количество наград, Средний процент успешных инспекций, Количество проектов, Общий бюджет, Рейтинг эффективности]
queries.sql_query: WITH ExperiencePercentile AS (SELECT ArchitectID, FirstName, LastName, YearsOfExperience, PERCENT_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY YearsOfExperience) AS ExpPercentile FROM Architects), ProjectStats AS (SELECT p.ArchitectID, p.ProjectID, COUNT(DISTINCT i.InspectionID) AS TotalInspections, SUM(CASE WHEN i.Result = 'Успешно' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS SuccessfulInspections, CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT i.InspectionID) > 0 THEN (SUM(CASE WHEN i.Result = 'Успешно' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT i.InspectionID)) ELSE 0 END AS SuccessRate FROM Projects p LEFT JOIN Inspections i ON p.ProjectID = i.ProjectID GROUP BY p.ArchitectID, p.ProjectID), ArchitectEfficiency AS (SELECT a.ArchitectID, a.FirstName, a.LastName, a.YearsOfExperience, a.Specialization, COUNT(DISTINCT aw.AwardID) AS AwardCount, AVG(ps.SuccessRate) AS AvgSuccessRate, COUNT(DISTINCT p.ProjectID) AS ProjectCount, SUM(p.Budget) AS TotalBudget, (COUNT(DISTINCT aw.AwardID) * a.YearsOfExperience * AVG(ps.SuccessRate)) / 100 AS EfficiencyScore FROM Architects a JOIN ExperiencePercentile ep ON a.ArchitectID = ep.ArchitectID JOIN Awards aw ON a.ArchitectID = aw.ArchitectID JOIN Projects p ON a.ArchitectID = p.ArchitectID JOIN ProjectStats ps ON p.ProjectID = ps.ProjectID WHERE ep.ExpPercentile >= 0.9 AND aw.Year > 2012 GROUP BY a.ArchitectID, a.FirstName, a.LastName, a.YearsOfExperience, a.Specialization HAVING AVG(ps.SuccessRate) >= 80) SELECT ae.FirstName, ae.LastName, ae.YearsOfExperience, ae.Specialization, ae.AwardCount, ROUND(ae.AvgSuccessRate, 2) AS AvgSuccessRate, ae.ProjectCount, ae.TotalBudget, ROUND(ae.EfficiencyScore, 2) AS EfficiencyScore FROM ArchitectEfficiency ae ORDER BY ae.EfficiencyScore DESC LIMIT 4;

    FROM Architects a
    WHERE a.YearsOfExperience >= (
        SELECT PERCENTILE_CONT(0.9) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY YearsOfExperience) FROM Architects
    )
),
ArchitectAwards AS (
    SELECT a.ArchitectID, COUNT(aw.AwardID) AS AwardCount
    FROM TopExperiencedArchitects a
    JOIN Awards aw ON a.ArchitectID = aw.ArchitectID
    WHERE aw.Year > 2012
    GROUP BY a.ArchitectID
),
ProjectInspections AS (
    SELECT p.ArchitectID, p.ProjectID, COUNT(i.InspectionID) AS TotalInspections,
           SUM(CASE WHEN i.Result = 'Успешно' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS SuccessfulInspections
    FROM Projects p
    JOIN Inspections i ON p.ProjectID = i.ProjectID
    GROUP BY p.ArchitectID, p.ProjectID
),
ArchitectProjectStats AS (
    SELECT pi.ArchitectID, COUNT(DISTINCT pi.ProjectID) AS ProjectCount,
           SUM(p.Budget) AS TotalBudget,
           AVG(CASE WHEN pi.TotalInspections > 0 THEN (pi.SuccessfulInspections * 100.0 / pi.TotalInspections) ELSE 0 END) AS AvgSuccessRate
    FROM ProjectInspections pi
    JOIN Projects p ON pi.ProjectID = p.ProjectID
    WHERE (pi.SuccessfulInspections * 100.0 / pi.TotalInspections) >= 80
    GROUP BY pi.ArchitectID
),
ArchitectEfficiency AS (
    SELECT a.FirstName, a.LastName, a.YearsOfExperience, a.Specialization,
           aw.AwardCount, aps.AvgSuccessRate, aps.ProjectCount, aps.TotalBudget,
           ROUND((aps.AvgSuccessRate * 0.4) + (aw.AwardCount * 0.3) + (aps.ProjectCount * 0.2) + (aps.TotalBudget / 1000000 * 0.1), 2) AS EfficiencyRating
    FROM TopExperiencedArchitects a
    JOIN ArchitectAwards aw ON a.ArchitectID = aw.ArchitectID
    JOIN ArchitectProjectStats aps ON a.ArchitectID = aps.ArchitectID
)
SELECT ae.FirstName, ae.LastName, ae.YearsOfExperience, ae.Specialization,
       ae.AwardCount, ae.AvgSuccessRate, ae.ProjectCount, ae.TotalBudget, ae.EfficiencyRating
FROM ArchitectEfficiency ae
ORDER BY ae.EfficiencyRating DESC
LIMIT 4;

    GROUP BY ta.ArchitectID, ta.FirstName, ta.LastName, ta.YearsOfExperience, ta.Specialization, aa.AwardCount
    HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT qp.ProjectID) > 0
)
SELECT
    aps.FirstName AS Имя,
    aps.LastName AS Фамилия,
    aps.YearsOfExperience AS "Стаж работы",
    aps.Specialization AS Специализация,
    aps.AwardCount AS "Количество наград",
    aps.AvgSuccessRate AS "Средний процент успешных инспекций",
    aps.ProjectCount AS "Количество проектов",
    aps.TotalBudget AS "Общий бюджет",
    (aps.YearsOfExperience * 0.4 + aps.AwardCount * 0.3 + aps.AvgSuccessRate * 100 * 0.3) AS "Рейтинг эффективности"
FROM ArchitectProjectSummary aps
ORDER BY "Рейтинг эффективности" DESC
LIMIT 4;

WITH ArchitectExperience AS (
  SELECT ArchitectID, YearsOfExperience,
         PERCENT_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY YearsOfExperience DESC) AS ExperiencePercentile
  FROM Architects
),
AwardedArchitects AS (
  SELECT a.ArchitectID, COUNT(*) AS AwardCount
  FROM Architects a
  JOIN Awards aw ON a.ArchitectID = aw.ArchitectID
  WHERE aw.Year > 2012
  GROUP BY a.ArchitectID
),
ProjectInspections AS (
  SELECT p.ProjectID, p.ArchitectID, 
         SUM(CASE WHEN i.Result = 'Успешно' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS SuccessfulInspections,
         COUNT(*) AS TotalInspections
  FROM Projects p
  JOIN Inspections i ON p.ProjectID = i.ProjectID
  GROUP BY p.ProjectID, p.ArchitectID
),
ArchitectEfficiency AS (
  SELECT a.ArchitectID, a.FirstName, a.LastName, a.YearsOfExperience, a.Specialization,
         COALESCE(aw.AwardCount, 0) AS AwardCount,
         SUM(pi.SuccessfulInspections * 100.0 / pi.TotalInspections) / COUNT(pi.ProjectID) AS AverageInspectionSuccessRate,
         COUNT(DISTINCT pi.ProjectID) AS ProjectCount,
         SUM(p.Budget) AS TotalBudget
  FROM Architects a
  LEFT JOIN AwardedArchitects aw ON a.ArchitectID = aw.ArchitectID
  JOIN Projects p ON a.ArchitectID = p.ArchitectID
  JOIN ProjectInspections pi ON p.ProjectID = pi.ProjectID
  GROUP BY a.ArchitectID, a.FirstName, a.LastName, a.YearsOfExperience, a.Specialization, aw.AwardCount
),
TopArchitects AS (
  SELECT ae.FirstName, ae.LastName, ae.YearsOfExperience, ae.Specialization,
         ae.AwardCount, ae.AverageInspectionSuccessRate, ae.ProjectCount, ae.TotalBudget,
         (ae.AwardCount * 0.2) + (ae.AverageInspectionSuccessRate * 0.3) + (ae.TotalBudget / 1000000 * 0.5) AS EfficiencyRating
  FROM ArchitectEfficiency ae
  JOIN ArchitectExperience ae2 ON ae.ArchitectID = ae2.ArchitectID
  WHERE ae2.ExperiencePercentile > 0.9 AND ae.AwardCount > 0 AND ae.AverageInspectionSuccessRate >= 80
)
SELECT FirstName, LastName, YearsOfExperience, Specialization, AwardCount, AverageInspectionSuccessRate, ProjectCount, TotalBudget, EfficiencyRating
FROM TopArchitects
ORDER BY EfficiencyRating DESC
LIMIT 4;

WITH RankedArchitects AS (
  SELECT 
    a.FirstName, 
    a.LastName, 
    a.YearsOfExperience, 
    a.Specialization, 
    COUNT(DISTINCT aw.AwardID) AS AwardCount,
    AVG(i.Result = 'Успешно') * 100 AS SuccessRate,
    COUNT(DISTINCT p.ProjectID) AS ProjectCount,
    SUM(p.Budget) AS TotalBudget,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY a.YearsOfExperience DESC) AS ExperienceRank,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY COUNT(DISTINCT aw.AwardID) DESC) AS AwardRank,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AVG(i.Result = 'Успешно') * 100 DESC) AS SuccessRank,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY COUNT(DISTINCT p.ProjectID) DESC) AS ProjectRank,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(p.Budget) DESC) AS BudgetRank
  FROM 
    Architects a
  JOIN 
    Projects p ON a.ArchitectID = p.ArchitectID
  JOIN 
    Inspections i ON p.ProjectID = i.ProjectID
  LEFT JOIN 
    Awards aw ON a.ArchitectID = aw.ArchitectID AND aw.Year > 2012
  WHERE 
    a.YearsOfExperience > (SELECT PERCENTILE_CONT(0.9) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY YearsOfExperience) FROM Architects)
  GROUP BY 
    a.FirstName, 
    a.LastName, 
    a.YearsOfExperience, 
    a.Specialization
  HAVING 
    AVG(i.Result = 'Успешно') * 100 >= 80
),
EfficiencyRanked AS (
  SELECT 
    FirstName, 
    LastName, 
    YearsOfExperience, 
    Specialization, 
    AwardCount, 
    SuccessRate, 
    ProjectCount, 
    TotalBudget,
    (ExperienceRank + AwardRank + SuccessRank + ProjectRank + BudgetRank) / 5 AS EfficiencyRank
  FROM 
    RankedArchitects
)
SELECT 
  FirstName, 
  LastName, 
  YearsOfExperience, 
  Specialization, 
  AwardCount, 
  SuccessRate, 
  ProjectCount, 
  TotalBudget,
  EfficiencyRank
FROM 
  EfficiencyRanked
ORDER BY 
  EfficiencyRank
LIMIT 4;

queries.gigachat_response:
WITH TopExperiencedArchitects AS (
    -- Архитекторы, входящие в топ-10% по стажу работы
    SELECT *
    FROM Architects
    WHERE YearsOfExperience >= (
        SELECT PERCENTILE_DISC(0.9) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY YearsOfExperience)
        FROM Architects
    )
),
AwardsAfter2012 AS (
    -- Награды после 2012 года
    SELECT ArchitectID, COUNT(*) AS NumAwards
    FROM Awards
    WHERE Year > 2012
    GROUP BY ArchitectID
),
SuccessfulInspectionsByArchitect AS (
    -- Проекты с успешным результатом проверок
    SELECT p.ArchitectID, COUNT(i.InspectionID) AS SuccessInspections, COUNT(p.ProjectID) AS TotalProjects
    FROM Projects p
    LEFT JOIN Inspections i ON p.ProjectID = i.ProjectID AND i.Result = 'Успешно'
    GROUP BY p.ArchitectID
),
ArchitectEffectiveness AS (
    -- Эффективность каждого архитектора
    SELECT tea.*, aa.NumAwards, si.SuccessInspections, si.TotalProjects,
           (si.SuccessInspections * 100.0 / NULLIF(si.TotalProjects, 0)) AS SuccessRate,
           SUM(p.Budget) OVER(PARTITION BY tea.ArchitectID) AS TotalBudget
    FROM TopExperiencedArchitects tea
    INNER JOIN AwardsAfter2012 aa ON tea.ArchitectID = aa.ArchitectID
    INNER JOIN SuccessfulInspectionsByArchitect si ON tea.ArchitectID = si.ArchitectID
    INNER JOIN Projects p ON tea.ArchitectID = p.ArchitectID
    WHERE (si.SuccessInspections * 100.0 / NULLIF(si.TotalProjects, 0)) >= 80
)
-- Итоговый результат
SELECT FirstName, LastName, YearsOfExperience, Specialization, NumAwards, SuccessRate, TotalProjects, TotalBudget,
       ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY SuccessRate DESC, TotalBudget DESC) AS EffectivenessRanking
FROM ArchitectEffectiveness
ORDER BY EffectivenessRanking ASC
LIMIT 4;

queries.question: Какие проекты демонстрируют наиболее высокую окупаемость инвестиций с учетом соотношения доходов к расходам, с группировкой по статусу проекта и типу контракта? Представить данные за последние 5 лет с учетом сезонных колебаний и показать топ-7 наиболее прибыльных проектов. [Ожидаемые колонки: Название проекта, Статус, Тип контракта, Бюджет проекта, Общий доход, Общие расходы, ROI, Сезонно скорректированный ROI, Ранг в группе, Общий ранг]
queries.sql_query: WITH ProjectFinances AS (SELECT p.ProjectID, p.ProjectName, p.Status, p.StartDate, QUARTER(p.StartDate) AS StartQuarter, p.Budget, c.Terms AS ContractType, c.PaymentSchedule, SUM(CASE WHEN f.Amount > 0 THEN f.Amount ELSE 0 END) AS TotalIncome, SUM(CASE WHEN f.Amount < 0 THEN ABS(f.Amount) ELSE 0 END) AS TotalExpenses, CASE WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN f.Amount < 0 THEN ABS(f.Amount) ELSE 0 END) > 0 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN f.Amount > 0 THEN f.Amount ELSE 0 END) / SUM(CASE WHEN f.Amount < 0 THEN ABS(f.Amount) ELSE 0 END) ELSE 0 END AS ROI FROM Projects p LEFT JOIN Contracts c ON p.ProjectID = c.ProjectID LEFT JOIN Finances f ON p.ProjectID = f.ProjectID WHERE p.StartDate >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 5 YEAR) GROUP BY p.ProjectID, p.ProjectName, p.Status, p.StartDate, p.Budget, c.Terms, c.PaymentSchedule), SeasonalAdjustment AS (SELECT StartQuarter, AVG(ROI) AS AvgQuarterROI FROM ProjectFinances GROUP BY StartQuarter), ProjectROI AS (SELECT pf.ProjectID, pf.ProjectName, pf.Status, pf.ContractType, pf.Budget, pf.TotalIncome, pf.TotalExpenses, pf.ROI, sa.AvgQuarterROI, pf.ROI / NULLIF(sa.AvgQuarterROI, 0) AS SeasonallyAdjustedROI FROM ProjectFinances pf JOIN SeasonalAdjustment sa ON pf.StartQuarter = sa.StartQuarter), ProjectProfitability AS (SELECT pr.ProjectID, pr.ProjectName, pr.Status, pr.ContractType, pr.Budget, pr.TotalIncome, pr.TotalExpenses, pr.ROI, pr.SeasonallyAdjustedROI, DENSE_RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY pr.Status, pr.ContractType ORDER BY pr.SeasonallyAdjustedROI DESC) AS RankWithinGroup, DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY pr.SeasonallyAdjustedROI DESC) AS OverallRank FROM ProjectROI pr) SELECT pp.ProjectName, pp.Status, pp.ContractType, pp.Budget AS Бюджет_проекта, pp.TotalIncome AS Общий_доход, pp.TotalExpenses AS Общие_расходы, ROUND(pp.ROI, 2) AS ROI, ROUND(pp.SeasonallyAdjustedROI, 2) AS Сезонно_скорректированный_ROI, pp.RankWithinGroup AS Ранг_в_группе, pp.OverallRank AS Общий_ранг FROM ProjectProfitability pp ORDER BY pp.SeasonallyAdjustedROI DESC LIMIT 7;

WITH Financials AS (
    SELECT 
        p.ProjectID,
        p.ProjectName,
        p.Status,
        c.Terms AS ContractType,
        p.Budget,
        SUM(CASE WHEN f.TransactionType LIKE '%доход%' THEN f.Amount ELSE 0 END) AS TotalIncome,
        SUM(CASE WHEN f.TransactionType LIKE '%расход%' THEN f.Amount ELSE 0 END) AS TotalExpenses,
        SUM(CASE WHEN f.TransactionType LIKE '%доход%' THEN f.Amount ELSE 0 END) - SUM(CASE WHEN f.TransactionType LIKE '%расход%' THEN f.Amount ELSE 0 END) AS NetIncome
    FROM 
        Projects p
    JOIN 
        Contracts c ON p.ProjectID = c.ProjectID
    JOIN 
        Finances f ON p.ProjectID = f.ProjectID
    WHERE 
        f.TransactionDate >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 5 YEAR)
    GROUP BY 
        p.ProjectID, p.ProjectName, p.Status, c.Terms, p.Budget
),
ROI_Calculation AS (
    SELECT 
        ProjectID,
        ProjectName,
        Status,
        ContractType,
        Budget,
        TotalIncome,
        TotalExpenses,
        CASE WHEN TotalExpenses <> 0 THEN (NetIncome / TotalExpenses) * 100 ELSE 0 END AS ROI
    FROM 
        Financials
),
Seasonal_Adjustment AS (
    SELECT 
        ProjectID,
        ProjectName,
        Status,
        ContractType,
        Budget,
        TotalIncome,
        TotalExpenses,
        ROI,
        ROI * (1 + (MONTH(CURRENT_DATE()) - 6) / 12.0) AS SeasonallyAdjustedROI
    FROM 
        ROI_Calculation
),
RankedProjects AS (
    SELECT 
        ProjectName,
        Status,
        ContractType,
        Budget,
        TotalIncome,
        TotalExpenses,
        ROI,
        SeasonallyAdjustedROI,
        RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY Status, ContractType ORDER BY SeasonallyAdjustedROI DESC) AS RankInGroup,
        RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SeasonallyAdjustedROI DESC) AS OverallRank
    FROM 
        Seasonal_Adjustment
)
SELECT 
    ProjectName,
    Status,
    ContractType,
    Budget,
    TotalIncome,
    TotalExpenses,
    ROI,
    SeasonallyAdjustedROI,
    RankInGroup,
    OverallRank
FROM 
    RankedProjects
WHERE 
    OverallRank <= 7
ORDER BY 
    OverallRank;

WITH ProjectFinances AS (
    SELECT
        p.ProjectID,
        p.ProjectName,
        p.Status,
        c.PaymentSchedule AS ContractType,
        p.Budget AS ProjectBudget,
        SUM(CASE WHEN f.TransactionType = 'Операционный доход' OR f.TransactionType = 'Разовоe поступление' THEN f.Amount ELSE 0 END) AS TotalRevenue,
        SUM(CASE WHEN f.TransactionType <> 'Операционный доход' AND f.TransactionType <> 'Разовоe поступление' THEN ABS(f.Amount) ELSE 0 END) AS TotalExpenses
    FROM
        Projects p
    JOIN
        Finances f ON p.ProjectID = f.ProjectID
    JOIN
        Contracts c ON p.ProjectID = c.ProjectID
    WHERE
        f.TransactionDate >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 5 YEAR)
    GROUP BY
        p.ProjectID, p.ProjectName, p.Status, c.PaymentSchedule, p.Budget
),
ROICalculation AS (
    SELECT
        ProjectID,
        ProjectName,
        Status,
        ContractType,
        ProjectBudget,
        TotalRevenue,
        TotalExpenses,
        (TotalRevenue - TotalExpenses) / ProjectBudget AS ROI
    FROM
        ProjectFinances
),
SeasonalAdjustment AS (
    SELECT
        *,
        ROI * (1 + (
            CASE
                WHEN MONTH(CURRENT_DATE()) IN (12, 1, 2) THEN 0.05  -- Winter
                WHEN MONTH(CURRENT_DATE()) IN (3, 4, 5) THEN -0.03 -- Spring
                WHEN MONTH(CURRENT_DATE()) IN (6, 7, 8) THEN 0.02  -- Summer
                ELSE -0.01                                          -- Autumn
            END
        )) AS SeasonallyAdjustedROI
    FROM
        ROICalculation
),
RankedProjects AS (
    SELECT
        *,
        RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY Status, ContractType ORDER BY SeasonallyAdjustedROI DESC) AS RankInGroup,
        RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SeasonallyAdjustedROI DESC) AS OverallRank
    FROM
        SeasonalAdjustment
)

    TotalExpenses AS "Общие расходы",

    SeasonallyAdjustedROI AS "Сезонно скорректированный ROI",

        f.TransactionDate >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 5 YEAR)
    GROUP BY
        p.ProjectID, p.ProjectName, p.Status, c.PaymentSchedule, p.Budget
),
ROICalculation AS (
    SELECT
        ProjectID,
        ProjectName,
        Status,
        ContractType,
        Budget,
        TotalRevenue,
        TotalExpenses,
        (TotalRevenue + TotalExpenses) / Budget AS ROI,
        -- Предположим, что сезонные колебания отсутствуют, или они уже учтены в данных.
        -- В противном случае, здесь нужно добавить логику для учета сезонности.
        (TotalRevenue + TotalExpenses) / Budget AS SeasonallyAdjustedROI
    FROM
        ProjectFinances
),
RankedProjects AS (
    SELECT
        ProjectName,
        Status,
        ContractType,
        Budget,
        TotalRevenue,
        TotalExpenses,
        ROI,
        SeasonallyAdjustedROI,
        RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY Status, ContractType ORDER BY SeasonallyAdjustedROI DESC) AS RankInGroup,
        RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SeasonallyAdjustedROI DESC) AS OverallRank
    FROM
        ROICalculation
)
SELECT
    ProjectName AS "Название проекта",
    Status AS "Статус",
    ContractType AS "Тип контракта",
    Budget AS "Бюджет проекта",
    TotalRevenue AS "Общий доход",
    TotalExpenses AS "Общие расходы",
    ROI,
    SeasonallyAdjustedROI AS "Сезонно скорректированный ROI",
    RankInGroup AS "Ранг в группе",
    OverallRank AS "Общий ранг"
FROM
    RankedProjects
ORDER BY
    "Общий ранг"
LIMIT 7;

WITH ProjectFinances AS (
  SELECT 
    p.ProjectID,
    p.ProjectName,
    p.Status,
    c.Terms AS ContractType,
    p.Budget,
    COALESCE(SUM(f.Amount), 0) AS TotalRevenue,
    COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN f.TransactionType = 'Расходы' THEN f.Amount ELSE 0 END), 0) AS TotalExpenses
  FROM 
    Projects p
  JOIN 
    Contracts c ON p.ProjectID = c.ProjectID
  LEFT JOIN 
    Finances f ON p.ProjectID = f.ProjectID
  WHERE 
    p.StartDate >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 5 YEAR)
  GROUP BY 
    p.ProjectID, p.ProjectName, p.Status, c.Terms, p.Budget
),
ProjectROI AS (
  SELECT 
    pf.ProjectName,
    pf.Status,
    pf.ContractType,
    pf.Budget,
    pf.TotalRevenue,
    pf.TotalExpenses,
    CASE 
      WHEN pf.TotalExpenses = 0 THEN pf.TotalRevenue
      ELSE pf.TotalRevenue / pf.TotalExpenses
    END AS ROI,
    CASE 
      WHEN pf.TotalExpenses = 0 THEN pf.TotalRevenue
      ELSE pf.TotalRevenue / pf.TotalExpenses * (1 + (EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CURRENT_DATE()) % 12) * 0.1)
    END AS SeasonallyAdjustedROI
  FROM 
    ProjectFinances pf
),
RankedProjects AS (
  SELECT 
    p.ProjectName,
    p.Status,
    p.ContractType,
    p.Budget,
    p.TotalRevenue,
    p.TotalExpenses,
    p.ROI,
    p.SeasonallyAdjustedROI,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY p.Status, p.ContractType ORDER BY p.SeasonallyAdjustedROI DESC) AS GroupRank,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY p.SeasonallyAdjustedROI DESC) AS OverallRank
  FROM 
    ProjectROI p
)
SELECT 
  ProjectName,
  Status,
  ContractType,
  Budget,
  TotalRevenue,
  TotalExpenses,
  ROI,
  SeasonallyAdjustedROI,
  GroupRank,
  OverallRank
FROM 
  RankedProjects
ORDER BY 
  SeasonallyAdjustedROI DESC
LIMIT 7;

WITH ProjectFinances AS (
    SELECT 
        f.ProjectID,
        MAX(CASE WHEN f.TransactionType = 'Операционный доход' OR f.TransactionType = 'Разовое поступление' THEN f.Amount ELSE 0 END) AS TotalIncome,
        ABS(SUM(CASE WHEN f.TransactionType = 'Расходы на материалы' OR f.TransactionType = 'Расходы на маркетинг' THEN f.Amount ELSE 0 END)) AS TotalExpenses
    FROM Finances f
    WHERE f.TransactionDate BETWEEN DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 5 YEAR) AND NOW()
    GROUP BY f.ProjectID
),
SeasonalAdjustments AS (
    SELECT 
        pf.ProjectID,
        pf.TotalIncome,
        pf.TotalExpenses,
        CASE 
            WHEN MONTH(MAX(f.TransactionDate)) IN (12, 1, 2) THEN pf.TotalIncome * 1.1 -- Winter adjustment
            WHEN MONTH(MAX(f.TransactionDate)) IN (3, 4, 5) THEN pf.TotalIncome * 1.05 -- Spring adjustment
            WHEN MONTH(MAX(f.TransactionDate)) IN (6, 7, 8) THEN pf.TotalIncome * 0.95 -- Summer adjustment
            ELSE pf.TotalIncome * 1.0 -- Autumn adjustment
        END AS SeasonallyAdjustedIncome
    FROM ProjectFinances pf
    INNER JOIN Finances f ON pf.ProjectID = f.ProjectID
    GROUP BY pf.ProjectID, pf.TotalIncome, pf.TotalExpenses
),
ProjectDetails AS (
    SELECT 
        p.ProjectID,
        p.ProjectName,
        p.Status,
        c.Terms AS ContractType,
        p.Budget,
        sa.TotalIncome,
        sa.TotalExpenses,
        CASE 
            WHEN sa.TotalExpenses <> 0 THEN (sa.TotalIncome - sa.TotalExpenses) / sa.TotalExpenses * 100
            ELSE NULL
        END AS ROI,
        CASE 
            WHEN sa.TotalExpenses <> 0 THEN (sa.SeasonallyAdjustedIncome - sa.TotalExpenses) / sa.TotalExpenses * 100
            ELSE NULL
        END AS SeasonallyAdjustedROI
    FROM Projects p
    LEFT JOIN Contracts c ON p.ProjectID = c.ProjectID
    LEFT JOIN SeasonalAdjustments sa ON p.ProjectID = sa.ProjectID
),
RankedProjects AS (
    SELECT 
        pd.*,
        RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY pd.Status ORDER BY pd.RankInGroup ASC) AS RankInStatusGroup,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY pd.SeasonallyAdjustedROI DESC) AS OverallRank
    FROM (
        SELECT 
            pd.*, 
            DENSE_RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY pd.Status ORDER BY pd.SeasonallyAdjustedROI DESC) AS RankInGroup
        FROM ProjectDetails pd
    ) pd
)
SELECT

    FROM

    LEFT JOIN

    WHERE

    GROUP BY

SeasonalAdjustments AS (
    SELECT 
        pf.*,
        CASE 
            WHEN MONTH(MAX(f.TransactionDate)) IN (12, 1, 2) THEN 1.1 -- Зима
            WHEN MONTH(MAX(f.TransactionDate)) IN (3, 4, 5) THEN 1.05 -- Весна
            WHEN MONTH(MAX(f.TransactionDate)) IN (6, 7, 8) THEN 1.0 -- Лето
            ELSE 0.95 -- Осень
        END AS SeasonFactor
    FROM

    GROUP BY

            ELSE NULL

(COALESCE(me.MaterialQualityVariation, 0) * 5 * 0.1) - (me.MaterialBudgetRatio * 0.2)) AS EfficiencyScore FROM ArchitectInspections ai JOIN MaterialEfficiency me ON ai.ArchitectID = me.ArchitectID) SELECT ei.FirstName, ei.LastName, ei.Specialization, ei.TotalInspections AS Общее_количество_инспекций, ei.SuccessfulInspections AS Успешные_инспекции, ei.FailedInspections AS Неуспешные_инспекции, ROUND(ei.SuccessRate, 2) AS Процент_успешных_инспекций, ROUND(ei.AvgMaterialQuality, 2) AS Средний_рейтинг_материалов, ROUND(ei.MaterialQualityVariation, 2) AS Вариация_качества_материалов, ei.MaterialCount AS Количество_материалов, ROUND(ei.TotalMaterialCost, 2) AS Общая_стоимость_материалов, ROUND(ei.TotalBudget, 2) AS Общий_бюджет, ROUND(ei.MaterialBudgetRatio, 2) AS Соотношение_материалов_к_бюджету, ROUND(ei.EfficiencyScore, 2) AS Индекс_эффективности FROM EfficiencyIndex ei ORDER BY ei.EfficiencyScore DESC LIMIT 5;

WITH InspectionStats AS (
    SELECT 
        a.ArchitectID,
        a.FirstName,
        a.LastName,
        a.Specialization,
        COUNT(i.InspectionID) AS TotalInspections,
        SUM(CASE WHEN i.Result = 'Успешно' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS SuccessfulInspections,
        SUM(CASE WHEN i.Result = 'Неуспешно' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS UnsuccessfulInspections,
        CASE WHEN COUNT(i.InspectionID) > 0 THEN (SUM(CASE WHEN i.Result = 'Успешно' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(i.InspectionID)) ELSE 0 END AS SuccessRate
    FROM Architects a
    JOIN Projects p ON a.ArchitectID = p.ArchitectID
    JOIN Inspections i ON p.ProjectID = i.ProjectID
    WHERE i.InspectionDate >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 3 YEAR)
    GROUP BY a.ArchitectID, a.FirstName, a.LastName, a.Specialization
),
MaterialStats AS (
    SELECT 
        a.ArchitectID,
        AVG(m.QualityRating) AS AvgMaterialQuality,
        STDDEV(m.QualityRating) AS QualityVariation,
        COUNT(DISTINCT m.MaterialID) AS MaterialCount,
        SUM(m.CostPerUnit * m.QuantityInStock) AS TotalMaterialCost,
        SUM(p.Budget) AS TotalBudget,
        CASE WHEN SUM(p.Budget) > 0 THEN (SUM(m.CostPerUnit * m.QuantityInStock) * 100.0 / SUM(p.Budget)) ELSE 0 END AS MaterialBudgetRatio
    FROM Architects a
    JOIN Projects p ON a.ArchitectID = p.ArchitectID
    JOIN Buildings b ON p.ProjectID = b.ProjectID
    JOIN Materials m ON b.Material = m.MaterialName
    GROUP BY a.ArchitectID
),
EfficiencyIndex AS (
    SELECT 
        i.ArchitectID,
        i.FirstName,
        i.LastName,
        i.Specialization,
        i.TotalInspections,
        i.SuccessfulInspections,
        i.UnsuccessfulInspections,
        i.SuccessRate,
        m.AvgMaterialQuality,
        m.QualityVariation,
        m.MaterialCount,
        m.TotalMaterialCost,
        m.TotalBudget,
        m.MaterialBudgetRatio,
        ROUND((i.SuccessRate * 0.4) + (m.AvgMaterialQuality * 0.3) + ((1 - m.QualityVariation) * 0.1) + ((1 - m.MaterialBudgetRatio) * 0.2), 2) AS EfficiencyIndex
    FROM InspectionStats i
    JOIN MaterialStats m ON i.ArchitectID = m.ArchitectID
)
SELECT 
    e.FirstName,
    e.LastName,
    e.Specialization,
    e.TotalInspections,
    e.SuccessfulInspections,
    e.UnsuccessfulInspections,
    e.SuccessRate,
    e.AvgMaterialQuality,
    e.QualityVariation,
    e.MaterialCount,
    e.TotalMaterialCost,
    e.TotalBudget,
    e.MaterialBudgetRatio,
    e.EfficiencyIndex
FROM EfficiencyIndex e
ORDER BY e.EfficiencyIndex DESC
LIMIT 5;

        a.ArchitectID,

        CASE

            ELSE 0
        END AS Процент_успешных_инспекций,
        AVG(apm.AvgMaterialRating) AS Средний_рейтинг_материалов,
        AVG(apm.MaterialQualityVariation) AS Вариация_качества_материалов,

)

    FROM Architects a

    LEFT JOIN Inspections i ON p.ProjectID = i.ProjectID AND i.InspectionDate >= DATE('now', '-3 years')
    GROUP BY a.ArchitectID, a.FirstName, a.LastName, a.Specialization
),
ArchitectMaterialStats AS (
    SELECT
        a.ArchitectID,
        AVG(m.QualityRating) AS AvgMaterialRating,
        STDDEV(m.QualityRating) AS MaterialQualityVariation,
        COUNT(DISTINCT m.MaterialID) AS MaterialCount,
        SUM(m.CostPerUnit * m.QuantityInStock) AS TotalMaterialCost
    FROM Architects a
    JOIN Projects p ON a.ArchitectID = p.ArchitectID
    JOIN Buildings b ON p.ProjectID = b.ProjectID
    JOIN Materials m ON b.Material = m.MaterialName

SELECT
    ais.FirstName,
    ais.LastName,
    ais.Specialization,
    ais.TotalInspections,
    ais.SuccessfulInspections,
    ais.FailedInspections,
    CASE
        WHEN ais.TotalInspections > 0 THEN (CAST(ais.SuccessfulInspections AS REAL) / ais.TotalInspections) * 100
        ELSE 0
    END AS SuccessPercentage,
    COALESCE(ams.AvgMaterialRating, 0) AS AvgMaterialRating,
    COALESCE(ams.MaterialQualityVariation, 0) AS MaterialQualityVariation,
    COALESCE(ams.MaterialCount, 0) AS MaterialCount,
    COALESCE(ams.TotalMaterialCost, 0) AS TotalMaterialCost,
    COALESCE(pb.TotalBudget, 0) AS TotalBudget,
    CASE
        WHEN pb.TotalBudget > 0 THEN (COALESCE(ams.TotalMaterialCost, 0) / pb.TotalBudget) * 100
        ELSE 0
    END AS MaterialToBudgetRatio,
    (0.4 * (CASE WHEN ais.TotalInspections > 0 THEN (CAST(ais.SuccessfulInspections AS REAL) / ais.TotalInspections) ELSE 0 END)) +
    (0.3 * COALESCE(ams.AvgMaterialRating, 0) / 10) +
    (0.1 * (1 - COALESCE(ams.MaterialQualityVariation, 0) / 10)) +
    (0.2 * (1 - (CASE WHEN pb.TotalBudget > 0 THEN (COALESCE(ams.TotalMaterialCost, 0) / pb.TotalBudget) ELSE 0 END))) AS EfficiencyIndex
FROM ArchitectInspectionStats ais
LEFT JOIN ArchitectMaterialStats ams ON ais.ArchitectID = ams.ArchitectID
LEFT JOIN ProjectBudgets pb ON ais.ArchitectID = pb.ArchitectID
ORDER BY EfficiencyIndex DESC
LIMIT 5;

WITH ArchitectInspections AS (

    a.ArchitectID,

    COUNT(i.InspectionID) AS TotalInspections,
    SUM(CASE WHEN i.Result = 'Успешно' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS SuccessfulInspections,
    SUM(CASE WHEN i.Result = 'Неуспешно' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS UnsuccessfulInspections
  FROM 
    Architects a
  JOIN 
    Projects p ON a.ArchitectID = p.ArchitectID
  JOIN 
    Inspections i ON p.ProjectID = i.ProjectID
  WHERE 
    i.InspectionDate >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 3 YEAR)
  GROUP BY 
    a.ArchitectID, a.FirstName, a.LastName, a.Specialization
),
ArchitectMaterials AS (
  SELECT 
    a.ArchitectID,
    AVG(m.QualityRating) AS AverageMaterialRating,
    VARIANCE(m.QualityRating) AS MaterialVariance,
    COUNT(DISTINCT m.MaterialID) AS MaterialCount,
    SUM(m.CostPerUnit * m.QuantityInStock) AS TotalMaterialCost,
    SUM(p.Budget) AS TotalBudget
  FROM 
    Architects a
  JOIN 
    Projects p ON a.ArchitectID = p.ArchitectID
  JOIN 
    Buildings b ON p.ProjectID = b.ProjectID
  JOIN 
    Materials m ON b.Material = m.MaterialName
  GROUP BY 
    a.ArchitectID
),
ArchitectEfficiency AS (
  SELECT 
    ai.ArchitectID,
    ai.FirstName,
    ai.LastName,
    ai.Specialization,
    ai.TotalInspections,
    ai.SuccessfulInspections,
    ai.UnsuccessfulInspections,
    ROUND(ai.SuccessfulInspections * 100.0 / ai.TotalInspections, 2) AS SuccessfulInspectionRate,
    am.AverageMaterialRating,
    am.MaterialVariance,
    am.MaterialCount,
    am.TotalMaterialCost,
    am.TotalBudget,
    ROUND(am.TotalMaterialCost * 100.0 / am.TotalBudget, 2) AS MaterialToBudgetRatio,
    ROUND(
      (ai.SuccessfulInspectionRate * 0.4) + 
      (am.AverageMaterialRating * 0.3) + 
      (am.MaterialVariance * 0.1) + 
      ((1 - am.MaterialToBudgetRatio) * 0.2), 
      2
    ) AS EfficiencyIndex
  FROM 
    ArchitectInspections ai
  JOIN 
    ArchitectMaterials am ON ai.ArchitectID = am.ArchitectID
)
SELECT 
  FirstName,
  LastName,
  Specialization,
  TotalInspections,
  SuccessfulInspections,
  UnsuccessfulInspections,

  AverageMaterialRating,

FROM

WITH ArchitectProjects AS (
  SELECT a.ArchitectID, a.FirstName, a.LastName, a.Specialization, p.ProjectID
  FROM Architects a
  JOIN Projects p ON a.ArchitectID = p.ArchitectID
),
InspectionStats AS (
  SELECT ap.ArchitectID, ap.FirstName, ap.LastName, ap.Specialization, 
         COUNT(i.InspectionID) AS TotalInspections,
         SUM(CASE WHEN i.Result = 'Успешно' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS SuccessfulInspections,
         SUM(CASE WHEN i.Result = 'Неуспешно' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FailedInspections
  FROM ArchitectProjects ap
  JOIN Inspections i ON ap.ProjectID = i.ProjectID
  WHERE i.InspectionDate >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 3 YEAR)
  GROUP BY ap.ArchitectID, ap.FirstName, ap.LastName, ap.Specialization
),
MaterialStats AS (
  SELECT ap.ArchitectID, ap.FirstName, ap.LastName, ap.Specialization, 
         AVG(m.QualityRating) AS AverageMaterialRating,
         VARIANCE(m.QualityRating) AS MaterialQualityVariance,
         COUNT(DISTINCT m.MaterialID) AS MaterialCount,
         SUM(m.CostPerUnit * m.QuantityInStock) AS TotalMaterialCost
  FROM ArchitectProjects ap
  JOIN Buildings b ON ap.ProjectID = b.ProjectID
  JOIN Materials m ON b.BuildingID = m.MaterialID
  GROUP BY ap.ArchitectID, ap.FirstName, ap.LastName, ap.Specialization
),
ProjectBudgets AS (
  SELECT ap.ArchitectID, ap.FirstName, ap.LastName, ap.Specialization, 
         SUM(p.Budget) AS TotalProjectBudget
  FROM ArchitectProjects ap
  JOIN Projects p ON ap.ProjectID = p.ProjectID
  GROUP BY ap.ArchitectID, ap.FirstName, ap.LastName, ap.Specialization
),
EfficiencyIndex AS (
  SELECT isq.ArchitectID, isq.FirstName, isq.LastName, isq.Specialization, 
         isq.TotalInspections, isq.SuccessfulInspections, isq.FailedInspections,
         (isq.SuccessfulInspections * 1.0 / isq.TotalInspections) * 100 AS SuccessfulInspectionPercentage,
         ms.AverageMaterialRating, ms.MaterialQualityVariance, ms.MaterialCount, ms.TotalMaterialCost,
         pb.TotalProjectBudget,
         (ms.TotalMaterialCost * 1.0 / pb.TotalProjectBudget) AS MaterialToBudgetRatio,
         ((isq.SuccessfulInspections * 1.0 / isq.TotalInspections) * 0.4) +
         (ms.AverageMaterialRating * 0.3) +
         (ms.MaterialQualityVariance * 0.1) +
         ((ms.TotalMaterialCost * 1.0 / pb.TotalProjectBudget) * 0.2) AS EfficiencyIndex
  FROM InspectionStats isq
  JOIN MaterialStats ms ON isq.ArchitectID = ms.ArchitectID
  JOIN ProjectBudgets pb ON isq.ArchitectID = pb.ArchitectID
)
SELECT FirstName, LastName, Specialization, TotalInspections, SuccessfulInspections, FailedInspections, 
       SuccessfulInspectionPercentage, AverageMaterialRating, MaterialQualityVariance, MaterialCount, 
       TotalMaterialCost, TotalProjectBudget, MaterialToBudgetRatio, EfficiencyIndex
FROM EfficiencyIndex
ORDER BY EfficiencyIndex DESC
LIMIT 5;

WITH ArchitectProjects AS (
    SELECT 
        a.ArchitectID, 
        a.FirstName, 
        a.LastName, 
        a.Specialization,
        p.ProjectID,
        p.Budget,
        i.InspectionID,
        i.Result,
        m.MaterialID,
        m.QualityRating,
        m.CostPerUnit,
        m.QuantityInStock
    FROM 
        Architects a
    INNER JOIN 
        Projects p ON a.ArchitectID = p.ArchitectID
    LEFT JOIN 
        Inspections i ON p.ProjectID = i.ProjectID
    LEFT JOIN 
        Buildings b ON p.ProjectID = b.ProjectID
    LEFT JOIN 
        Materials m ON b.Material = m.MaterialName
    WHERE 
        p.EndDate BETWEEN CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL 3 YEAR AND CURRENT_DATE()
),
ArchitectMetrics AS (
    SELECT 
        ap.ArchitectID,
        ap.FirstName,
        ap.LastName,
        ap.Specialization,
        COUNT(ap.InspectionID) AS TotalInspections,
        SUM(CASE WHEN ap.Result = 'Успешно' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS SuccessfulInspections,
        SUM(CASE WHEN ap.Result <> 'Успешно' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS UnsuccessfulInspections,
        AVG(ap.QualityRating) AS AverageQualityRating,
        STDDEV_SAMP(ap.QualityRating) AS VariationQualityRating,
        COUNT(DISTINCT ap.MaterialID) AS NumberOfMaterials,
        SUM(ap.CostPerUnit * ap.QuantityInStock) AS TotalMaterialCost,
        SUM(ap.Budget) AS TotalBudget,
        SUM(ap.CostPerUnit * ap.QuantityInStock) / NULLIF(SUM(ap.Budget), 0) AS MaterialToBudgetRatio
    FROM 
        ArchitectProjects ap
    GROUP BY 
        ap.ArchitectID, ap.FirstName, ap.LastName, ap.Specialization
),
FinalResults AS (
    SELECT 
        am.*,
        (SuccessfulInspections / NULLIF(TotalInspections, 0)) * 40 +
        AverageQualityRating * 30 +
        VariationQualityRating * 10 +
        MaterialToBudgetRatio * 20 AS EfficiencyIndex
    FROM 
        ArchitectMetrics am
)
SELECT 
    FirstName, 
    LastName, 
    Specialization, 
    TotalInspections, 
    SuccessfulInspections, 
    UnsuccessfulInspections, 
    (SuccessfulInspections / NULLIF(TotalInspections, 0)) * 100 AS SuccessRatePercentage, 
    AverageQualityRating, 
    VariationQualityRating, 
    NumberOfMaterials, 
    TotalMaterialCost, 
    TotalBudget, 
    MaterialToBudgetRatio, 
    EfficiencyIndex
FROM 
    FinalResults
ORDER BY 
    EfficiencyIndex DESC
LIMIT 5;

queries.question: Какие здания, построенные после 2015 года, имеют более 50 этажей и расположены в проектах с бюджетом более 150 миллионов рублей? Для каждого здания показать подробную информацию о нем, о проекте, информацию об архитекторе с его опытом и специализацией. Ограничить результат 7 записями, отсортированными по высоте здания.
queries.sql_query: SELECT b.BuildingName, b.Height, b.Floors, b.Material, b.Style, p.ProjectName, p.Budget, p.Location, a.FirstName, a.LastName, a.YearsOfExperience, a.Specialization FROM Buildings b JOIN Projects p ON b.ProjectID = p.ProjectID JOIN Architects a ON p.ArchitectID = a.ArchitectID WHERE b.YearCompleted > 2015 AND b.Floors > 50 AND p.Budget > 150000000 ORDER BY b.Height DESC LIMIT 7;

queries.question: Какие клиенты, работающие с архитекторами, имеющими опыт более 20 лет, заключили контракты на сумму более 200 тысяч рублей за последние 3 года (и сколько контрактов) и имеют успешные инспекции по своим проектам? Показать топ-6 клиентов по общему бюджету проектов.
queries.sql_query: WITH RecentContracts AS (SELECT cl.ClientID, cl.CompanyName, cl.City, cl.Country, a.ArchitectID, a.FirstName AS ArchitectFirstName, a.LastName AS ArchitectLastName, a.YearsOfExperience, COUNT(DISTINCT co.ContractID) AS ContractCount, SUM(co.Amount) AS TotalContractAmount, SUM(p.Budget) AS TotalProjectBudget FROM Clients cl JOIN Contracts co ON cl.ClientID = co.ClientID JOIN Projects p ON co.ProjectID = p.ProjectID JOIN Architects a ON p.ArchitectID = a.ArchitectID JOIN Inspections i ON p.ProjectID = i.ProjectID WHERE a.YearsOfExperience > 20 AND co.Amount > 200000 AND co.ContractDate >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 3 YEAR) AND i.Result = 'Успешно' GROUP BY cl.ClientID, cl.CompanyName, cl.City, cl.Country, a.ArchitectID, a.FirstName, a.LastName, a.YearsOfExperience) SELECT rc.CompanyName, rc.City, rc.Country, rc.ArchitectFirstName, rc.ArchitectLastName, rc.YearsOfExperience, rc.ContractCount, rc.TotalContractAmount, rc.TotalProjectBudget FROM RecentContracts rc ORDER BY rc.TotalProjectBudget DESC LIMIT 6;

queries.question: Какие проекты имеют наилучшее соотношение качества материалов к бюджету и при этом успешно прошли не менее двух инспекций за последний год? Показать топ-8 проектов с детализацией по используемым материалам и информацией о разрешениях. [Ожидаемые колонки: Название проекта, Местоположение, Бюджет, Среднее качество материалов, Количество материалов, Используемые материалы, Количество инспекций, Количество успешных инспекций, Количество разрешений, Количество действующих разрешений, Соотношение качества к бюджету]
queries.sql_query: WITH ProjectMaterials AS (SELECT p.ProjectID, p.ProjectName, p.StartDate, p.EndDate, p.Budget, p.Location, AVG(m.QualityRating) AS AvgMaterialQuality, COUNT(DISTINCT m.MaterialID) AS MaterialCount, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT m.MaterialName SEPARATOR ', ') AS MaterialsUsed, SUM(m.CostPerUnit * m.QuantityInStock) AS TotalMaterialCost FROM Projects p JOIN Materials m ON TRUE WHERE p.StartDate >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) GROUP BY p.ProjectID, p.ProjectName, p.StartDate, p.EndDate, p.Budget, p.Location), ProjectInspections AS (SELECT p.ProjectID, COUNT(i.InspectionID) AS InspectionCount, SUM(CASE WHEN i.Result = 'Успешно' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS SuccessfulInspections FROM Projects p JOIN Inspections i ON p.ProjectID = i.ProjectID WHERE i.InspectionDate >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) GROUP BY p.ProjectID), ProjectPermits AS (SELECT p.ProjectID, COUNT(pe.PermitID) AS PermitCount, SUM(CASE WHEN pe.Status = 'Действующий' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ActivePermits FROM Projects p JOIN Permits pe ON p.ProjectID = pe.ProjectID GROUP BY p.ProjectID) SELECT pm.ProjectName, pm.Location, pm.Budget, pm.AvgMaterialQuality, pm.MaterialCount, pm.MaterialsUsed, pi.InspectionCount, pi.SuccessfulInspections, pp.PermitCount, pp.ActivePermits, (pm.AvgMaterialQuality / (pm.Budget / 1000000)) AS QualityBudgetRatio FROM ProjectMaterials pm JOIN ProjectInspections pi ON pm.ProjectID = pi.ProjectID JOIN ProjectPermits pp ON pm.ProjectID = pp.ProjectID WHERE pi.SuccessfulInspections >= 2 ORDER BY QualityBudgetRatio DESC LIMIT 8;
queries.gpt-4o_response:
WITH MaterialQuality AS (
    SELECT 
        p.ProjectID,
        AVG(m.QualityRating) AS AvgMaterialQuality,
        COUNT(m.MaterialID) AS MaterialCount,
        GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT m.MaterialName) AS UsedMaterials
    FROM Projects p
    JOIN Buildings b ON p.ProjectID = b.ProjectID
    JOIN Materials m ON b.Material = m.MaterialName
    GROUP BY p.ProjectID
),
InspectionStats AS (
    SELECT 
        p.ProjectID,
        COUNT(i.InspectionID) AS TotalInspections,
        SUM(CASE WHEN i.Result = 'Успешно' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS SuccessfulInspections
    FROM Projects p
    JOIN Inspections i ON p.ProjectID = i.ProjectID
    WHERE i.InspectionDate >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY p.ProjectID
),
PermitStats AS (
    SELECT 
        p.ProjectID,
        COUNT(pe.PermitID) AS TotalPermits,
        SUM(CASE WHEN pe.Status = 'Действующий' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ActivePermits
    FROM Projects p
    JOIN Permits pe ON p.ProjectID = pe.ProjectID
    GROUP BY p.ProjectID
),
ProjectQualityBudgetRatio AS (
    SELECT 
        p.ProjectID,
        p.ProjectName,
        p.Location,
        p.Budget,
        mq.AvgMaterialQuality,
        mq.MaterialCount,
        mq.UsedMaterials,
        is.TotalInspections,
        is.SuccessfulInspections,
        ps.TotalPermits,
        ps.ActivePermits,
        CASE WHEN p.Budget > 0 THEN mq.AvgMaterialQuality / p.Budget ELSE 0 END AS QualityBudgetRatio
    FROM Projects p
    JOIN MaterialQuality mq ON p.ProjectID = mq.ProjectID
    JOIN InspectionStats is ON p.ProjectID = is.ProjectID
    JOIN PermitStats ps ON p.ProjectID = ps.ProjectID
    WHERE is.SuccessfulInspections >= 2
)
SELECT 
    ProjectName AS Название_проекта,
    Location AS Местоположение,
    Budget AS Бюджет,
    AvgMaterialQuality AS Среднее_качество_материалов,
    MaterialCount AS Количество_материалов,
    UsedMaterials AS Используемые_материалы,
    TotalInspections AS Количество_инспекций,
    SuccessfulInspections AS Количество_успешных_инспекций,
    TotalPermits AS Количество_разрешений,
    ActivePermits AS Количество_действующих_разрешений,
    QualityBudgetRatio AS Соотношение_качества_к_бюджету
FROM ProjectQualityBudgetRatio
ORDER BY QualityBudgetRatio DESC
LIMIT 8;

queries.gigachat_response:
WITH ProjectDetails AS (
    SELECT 
        pr.ProjectID,
        pr.ProjectName,
        pr.Location,
        pr.Budget,
        AVG(mat.QualityRating) AS AverageQualityRating,
        COUNT(DISTINCT mat.MaterialID) AS NumberOfMaterials,
        STRING_AGG(CONCAT('Материал:', mat.MaterialName, ', Поставщик:', sup.SupplierName), '; ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY mat.MaterialID ASC) AS UsedMaterials,
        COUNT(ins.InspectionID) AS TotalInspections,
        SUM(CASE WHEN ins.Result = 'Успешно' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS SuccessfulInspections,
        COUNT(per.PermitID) AS TotalPermits,
        SUM(CASE WHEN per.Status = 'Действующий' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ActivePermits,
        AVG(mat.QualityRating)/pr.Budget AS QualityToBudgetRatio
    FROM 
        Projects pr
    LEFT JOIN 
        Buildings bu ON pr.ProjectID = bu.ProjectID
    LEFT JOIN 
        Materials mat ON bu.Material = mat.MaterialName
    LEFT JOIN 
        Suppliers sup ON mat.SupplierID = sup.SupplierID
    LEFT JOIN 
        Inspections ins ON pr.ProjectID = ins.ProjectID
    LEFT JOIN 
        Permits per ON pr.ProjectID = per.ProjectID
    WHERE 
        ins.InspectionDate BETWEEN CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL '1 year' AND CURRENT_DATE()
    GROUP BY 
        pr.ProjectID, pr.ProjectName, pr.Location, pr.Budget
    HAVING 
        SuccessfulInspections >= 2
)
SELECT *
FROM ProjectDetails
ORDER BY QualityToBudgetRatio DESC
LIMIT 8;

queries.question: Какие сотрудники из отделов с бюджетом более 1 миллиона рублей участвуют в проектах, использующих материалы с качеством выше 8, и при этом имеют зарплату выше средней по компании? Показать топ-5 сотрудников по стажу работы. [Ожидаемые колонки: Имя, Фамилия, Должность, Стаж работы, Зарплата, Отдел, Бюджет отдела, Количество проектов, Общий бюджет проектов]
queries.sql_query: WITH EmployeeDepartments AS (SELECT e.EmployeeID, e.FirstName, e.LastName, e.Position, e.HireDate, e.Salary, d.DepartmentName, d.Budget AS DepartmentBudget FROM Employees e JOIN Departments d ON e.DepartmentID = d.DepartmentID WHERE d.Budget > 1000000), AvgSalary AS (SELECT AVG(Salary) AS CompanyAvgSalary FROM Employees), HighQualityProjects AS (SELECT p.ProjectID, p.ProjectName, p.Budget, COUNT(DISTINCT m.MaterialID) AS HighQualityMaterials FROM Projects p JOIN Materials m ON m.QualityRating > 8 GROUP BY p.ProjectID, p.ProjectName, p.Budget HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT m.MaterialID) > 0) SELECT ed.FirstName, ed.LastName, ed.Position, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, ed.HireDate, CURRENT_DATE()) AS YearsOfExperience, ed.Salary, ed.DepartmentName, ed.DepartmentBudget, COUNT(DISTINCT hqp.ProjectID) AS ProjectCount, SUM(hqp.Budget) AS TotalProjectBudget FROM EmployeeDepartments ed JOIN Departments d ON ed.DepartmentName = d.DepartmentName JOIN HighQualityProjects hqp ON TRUE, AvgSalary WHERE ed.Salary > AvgSalary.CompanyAvgSalary GROUP BY ed.EmployeeID, ed.FirstName, ed.LastName, ed.Position, ed.HireDate, ed.Salary, ed.DepartmentName, ed.DepartmentBudget ORDER BY YearsOfExperience DESC LIMIT 5;

    FROM Employees e
    JOIN Departments d ON e.DepartmentID = d.DepartmentID
    WHERE d.Budget > 1000000
    AND e.Salary > (SELECT AverageSalary FROM AvgSalary)

  SELECT e.EmployeeID, e.FirstName, e.LastName, e.Position, e.HireDate, e.Salary, 
         d.DepartmentName, d.Budget AS DepartmentBudget, 
         COUNT(DISTINCT p.ProjectID) AS ProjectCount, 
         SUM(p.Budget) AS TotalProjectBudget
  FROM Employees e
  JOIN Departments d ON e.DepartmentID = d.DepartmentID
  JOIN Projects p ON e.EmployeeID = p.ArchitectID
  JOIN Buildings b ON p.ProjectID = b.ProjectID
  JOIN Materials m ON b.Material = m.MaterialName
  WHERE d.Budget > 1000000 AND m.QualityRating > 8 AND e.Salary > (SELECT AVG(Salary) FROM Employees)
  GROUP BY e.EmployeeID, e.FirstName, e.LastName, e.Position, e.HireDate, e.Salary, 
           d.DepartmentName, d.Budget
),
RankedEmployees AS (
  SELECT FirstName, LastName, Position, 
         TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, HireDate, CURDATE()) AS YearsOfExperience, 
         Salary, DepartmentName, DepartmentBudget, ProjectCount, TotalProjectBudget
  FROM EmployeeProjects
)
SELECT FirstName, LastName, Position, YearsOfExperience, Salary, DepartmentName, DepartmentBudget, ProjectCount, TotalProjectBudget
FROM RankedEmployees
ORDER BY YearsOfExperience DESC
LIMIT 5;

queries.question: Какие архитекторы, работающие со зданиями в стиле 'Современный' или 'Классический', имеют наибольшее количество наград и при этом их проекты имеют самое высокое соотношение успешных к неуспешным инспекциям? Показать топ-4 архитектора с рейтингом эффективности. [Ожидаемые колонки: Имя, Фамилия, Стаж работы, Специализация, Количество наград, Общее количество зданий, Количество зданий в стиле, Общее количество инспекций, Успешные инспекции, Неуспешные инспекции, Соотношение успешных к неуспешным, Рейтинг эффективности]
queries.sql_query: WITH ArchitectAwards AS (SELECT a.ArchitectID, a.FirstName, a.LastName, a.YearsOfExperience, a.Specialization, COUNT(aw.AwardID) AS AwardCount FROM Architects a LEFT JOIN Awards aw ON a.ArchitectID = aw.ArchitectID GROUP BY a.ArchitectID, a.FirstName, a.LastName, a.YearsOfExperience, a.Specialization), ArchitectBuildings AS (SELECT a.ArchitectID, COUNT(DISTINCT b.BuildingID) AS BuildingCount, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN b.Style IN ('Современный', 'Классический') THEN b.BuildingID END) AS StyleBuildingCount FROM Architects a JOIN Projects p ON a.ArchitectID = p.ArchitectID JOIN Buildings b ON p.ProjectID = b.ProjectID GROUP BY a.ArchitectID), ArchitectInspections AS (SELECT a.ArchitectID, COUNT(DISTINCT i.InspectionID) AS TotalInspections, SUM(CASE WHEN i.Result = 'Успешно' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS SuccessfulInspections, SUM(CASE WHEN i.Result = 'Неуспешно' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FailedInspections, CASE WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN i.Result = 'Неуспешно' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) > 0 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN i.Result = 'Успешно' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / SUM(CASE WHEN i.Result = 'Неуспешно' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN i.Result = 'Успешно' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END AS SuccessRatio FROM Architects a JOIN Projects p ON a.ArchitectID = p.ArchitectID JOIN Inspections i ON p.ProjectID = i.ProjectID GROUP BY a.ArchitectID) SELECT aa.FirstName, aa.LastName, aa.YearsOfExperience, aa.Specialization, aa.AwardCount, ab.BuildingCount, ab.StyleBuildingCount, ai.TotalInspections, ai.SuccessfulInspections, ai.FailedInspections, ROUND(ai.SuccessRatio, 2) AS SuccessRatio, ROUND((aa.AwardCount * 0.3) + (ab.StyleBuildingCount * 0.3) + (ai.SuccessRatio * 0.4), 2) AS EfficiencyRating FROM ArchitectAwards aa JOIN ArchitectBuildings ab ON aa.ArchitectID = ab.ArchitectID JOIN ArchitectInspections ai ON aa.ArchitectID = ai.ArchitectID WHERE ab.StyleBuildingCount > 0 ORDER BY EfficiencyRating DESC LIMIT 4;

WITH ArchitectAwards AS (
    SELECT a.ArchitectID, a.FirstName, a.LastName, a.YearsOfExperience, a.Specialization, COUNT(aw.AwardID) AS AwardCount
    FROM Architects a
    LEFT JOIN Awards aw ON a.ArchitectID = aw.ArchitectID
    GROUP BY a.ArchitectID, a.FirstName, a.LastName, a.YearsOfExperience, a.Specialization
),
BuildingStyles AS (
    SELECT b.ProjectID, b.Style, COUNT(b.BuildingID) AS BuildingCount
    FROM Buildings b
    WHERE b.Style IN ('Современный', 'Классический')
    GROUP BY b.ProjectID, b.Style
),
ProjectInspections AS (
    SELECT p.ArchitectID, COUNT(i.InspectionID) AS TotalInspections,
           SUM(CASE WHEN i.Result = 'Успешно' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS SuccessfulInspections,
           SUM(CASE WHEN i.Result = 'Неуспешно' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS UnsuccessfulInspections
    FROM Projects p
    JOIN Inspections i ON p.ProjectID = i.ProjectID
    GROUP BY p.ArchitectID
),
ArchitectEfficiency AS (
    SELECT aa.ArchitectID, aa.FirstName, aa.LastName, aa.YearsOfExperience, aa.Specialization, aa.AwardCount,
           COALESCE(SUM(bs.BuildingCount), 0) AS TotalBuildings,
           COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN bs.Style IN ('Современный', 'Классический') THEN bs.BuildingCount ELSE 0 END), 0) AS StyleBuildings,
           COALESCE(pi.TotalInspections, 0) AS TotalInspections,
           COALESCE(pi.SuccessfulInspections, 0) AS SuccessfulInspections,
           COALESCE(pi.UnsuccessfulInspections, 0) AS UnsuccessfulInspections,
           CASE WHEN COALESCE(pi.UnsuccessfulInspections, 0) > 0 THEN COALESCE(pi.SuccessfulInspections, 0) * 1.0 / pi.UnsuccessfulInspections ELSE NULL END AS SuccessRatio,
           (aa.AwardCount * 0.4 + COALESCE(pi.SuccessfulInspections, 0) * 0.6) AS EfficiencyRating
    FROM ArchitectAwards aa
    LEFT JOIN Projects p ON aa.ArchitectID = p.ArchitectID
    LEFT JOIN BuildingStyles bs ON p.ProjectID = bs.ProjectID
    LEFT JOIN ProjectInspections pi ON aa.ArchitectID = pi.ArchitectID
    GROUP BY aa.ArchitectID, aa.FirstName, aa.LastName, aa.YearsOfExperience, aa.Specialization, aa.AwardCount, pi.TotalInspections, pi.SuccessfulInspections, pi.UnsuccessfulInspections
)

WITH ArchitectAwards AS (
  SELECT a.ArchitectID, a.FirstName, a.LastName, a.YearsOfExperience, a.Specialization, COUNT(DISTINCT aw.AwardID) AS AwardCount
  FROM Architects a
  LEFT JOIN Awards aw ON a.ArchitectID = aw.ArchitectID
  GROUP BY a.ArchitectID, a.FirstName, a.LastName, a.YearsOfExperience, a.Specialization
),
ArchitectBuildings AS (
  SELECT a.ArchitectID, a.FirstName, a.LastName, COUNT(DISTINCT b.BuildingID) AS TotalBuildings,
         SUM(CASE WHEN b.Style IN ('Современный', 'Классический') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS StyleBuildings
  FROM Architects a
  JOIN Projects p ON a.ArchitectID = p.ArchitectID
  JOIN Buildings b ON p.ProjectID = b.ProjectID
  GROUP BY a.ArchitectID, a.FirstName, a.LastName
),
ArchitectInspections AS (
  SELECT a.ArchitectID, a.FirstName, a.LastName, COUNT(DISTINCT i.InspectionID) AS TotalInspections,
         SUM(CASE WHEN i.Result = 'Успешно' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS SuccessfulInspections,
         SUM(CASE WHEN i.Result = 'Неуспешно' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS UnsuccessfulInspections,
         CASE WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN i.Result = 'Неуспешно' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = 0 THEN 1 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN i.Result = 'Успешно' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / SUM(CASE WHEN i.Result = 'Неуспешно' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END AS InspectionRatio
  FROM Architects a
  JOIN Projects p ON a.ArchitectID = p.ArchitectID
  JOIN Inspections i ON p.ProjectID = i.ProjectID
  GROUP BY a.ArchitectID, a.FirstName, a.LastName
),
ArchitectEfficiency AS (
  SELECT aa.ArchitectID, aa.FirstName, aa.LastName, aa.YearsOfExperience, aa.Specialization, aa.AwardCount,
         ab.TotalBuildings, ab.StyleBuildings, ai.TotalInspections, ai.SuccessfulInspections, ai.UnsuccessfulInspections, ai.InspectionRatio,
         (aa.AwardCount * 0.3) + (ab.StyleBuildings * 0.2) + (ai.InspectionRatio * 0.5) AS EfficiencyRating
  FROM ArchitectAwards aa
  JOIN ArchitectBuildings ab ON aa.ArchitectID = ab.ArchitectID
  JOIN ArchitectInspections ai ON aa.ArchitectID = ai.ArchitectID
  WHERE ab.StyleBuildings > 0 AND ai.InspectionRatio IS NOT NULL
)
SELECT FirstName, LastName, YearsOfExperience, Specialization, AwardCount, TotalBuildings, StyleBuildings, TotalInspections, SuccessfulInspections, UnsuccessfulInspections, InspectionRatio, EfficiencyRating
FROM ArchitectEfficiency
ORDER BY EfficiencyRating DESC
LIMIT 4;

queries.gigachat_response:
WITH ArchitectBuildings AS (
    SELECT 
        d.ArchitectID,
        a.FirstName,
        a.LastName,
        a.YearsOfExperience,
        a.Specialization,
        COUNT(b.BuildingID) AS TotalBuildings,
        SUM(CASE WHEN b.Style IN ('Современный', 'Классический') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS StyledBuildings
    FROM 
        Designs d
    INNER JOIN 
        Buildings b ON d.DesignID = b.BuildingID
    INNER JOIN 
        Architects a ON d.ArchitectID = a.ArchitectID
    GROUP BY 
        d.ArchitectID, a.FirstName, a.LastName, a.YearsOfExperience, a.Specialization
),
ArchitectAwards AS (
    SELECT 
        aw.ArchitectID,
        COUNT(*) AS NumAwards
    FROM 
        Awards aw
    GROUP BY 
        aw.ArchitectID
),
ArchitectInspections AS (
    SELECT 
        p.ArchitectID,
        COUNT(i.InspectionID) AS TotalInspections,
        SUM(CASE WHEN i.Result = 'Успешно' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS SuccessInspections,
        SUM(CASE WHEN i.Result <> 'Успешно' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FailInspections
    FROM 
        Projects p
    LEFT JOIN 
        Inspections i ON p.ProjectID = i.ProjectID
    GROUP BY 
        p.ArchitectID
),
FinalResult AS (
    SELECT 
        ab.FirstName,
        ab.LastName,
        ab.YearsOfExperience,
        ab.Specialization,
        aa.NumAwards,
        ab.TotalBuildings,
        ab.StyledBuildings,
        ai.TotalInspections,
        ai.SuccessInspections,
        ai.FailInspections,
        CASE 
            WHEN ai.FailInspections = 0 OR ai.SuccessInspections IS NULL THEN ai.SuccessInspections::FLOAT
            ELSE CAST(ai.SuccessInspections AS FLOAT) / ai.FailInspections
        END AS SuccessFailRatio,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY aa.NumAwards DESC, SuccessFailRatio DESC) AS Ranking
    FROM 
        ArchitectBuildings ab
    INNER JOIN 
        ArchitectAwards aa ON ab.ArchitectID = aa.ArchitectID
    INNER JOIN 
        ArchitectInspections ai ON ab.ArchitectID = ai.ArchitectID
    WHERE 
        ab.StyledBuildings > 0
)
SELECT 
    FirstName, 
    LastName, 
    YearsOfExperience, 
    Specialization, 
    NumAwards, 
    TotalBuildings, 
    StyledBuildings, 
    TotalInspections, 
    SuccessInspections, 
    FailInspections, 
    SuccessFailRatio, 
    Ranking AS Эффективность
FROM 
    FinalResult
WHERE 
    Ranking <= 4
ORDER BY 
    Ranking ASC;
