queries.question: Какие строительные материалы наиболее часто используются в проектах с бюджетом свыше 150 миллионов рублей и какие поставщики обеспечивают их наивысшее качество? Показать топ-9 материалов с детализацией по поставщикам и проектам за последние 2 года. [Ожидаемые колонки: Название материала, Количество проектов, Средний рейтинг качества, Название поставщика, Город поставщика, Страна поставщика, Список проектов]
queries.sql_query: WITH HighBudgetProjects AS (SELECT p.ProjectID, p.ProjectName, p.Budget, p.StartDate FROM Projects p WHERE p.Budget > 150000000 AND p.StartDate >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 2 YEAR)), MaterialUsage AS (SELECT p.ProjectID, m.MaterialID, m.MaterialName, m.QualityRating, m.CostPerUnit, m.SupplierID, COUNT(*) AS UsageCount FROM HighBudgetProjects p JOIN Materials m ON TRUE GROUP BY p.ProjectID, m.MaterialID, m.MaterialName, m.QualityRating, m.CostPerUnit, m.SupplierID), MaterialStats AS (SELECT mu.MaterialName, COUNT(DISTINCT mu.ProjectID) AS ProjectCount, AVG(mu.QualityRating) AS AvgQuality, s.SupplierName, s.City AS SupplierCity, s.Country AS SupplierCountry FROM MaterialUsage mu JOIN Suppliers s ON mu.SupplierID = s.SupplierID GROUP BY mu.MaterialName, s.SupplierName, s.City, s.Country) SELECT ms.MaterialName, ms.ProjectCount, ROUND(ms.AvgQuality, 2) AS СреднийРейтингКачества, ms.SupplierName AS Поставщик, ms.SupplierCity AS ГородПоставщика, ms.SupplierCountry AS СтранаПоставщика, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT p.ProjectName SEPARATOR ', ') FROM HighBudgetProjects p JOIN MaterialUsage mu ON p.ProjectID = mu.ProjectID WHERE mu.MaterialName = ms.MaterialName) AS СписокПроектов FROM MaterialStats ms ORDER BY ms.ProjectCount DESC, ms.AvgQuality DESC LIMIT 9;
queries.gpt-4o_response:
WITH RecentProjects AS (
    SELECT ProjectID, ProjectName
    FROM Projects
    WHERE Budget > 150000000 AND StartDate >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 2 YEAR)
),
MaterialUsage AS (
    SELECT m.MaterialName, m.SupplierID, COUNT(DISTINCT rp.ProjectID) AS ProjectCount, AVG(m.QualityRating) AS AvgQualityRating
    FROM Materials m
    JOIN Buildings b ON m.MaterialName = b.Material
    JOIN RecentProjects rp ON b.ProjectID = rp.ProjectID
    GROUP BY m.MaterialName, m.SupplierID
),
TopMaterials AS (
    SELECT mu.MaterialName, mu.SupplierID, mu.ProjectCount, mu.AvgQualityRating
    FROM MaterialUsage mu
    ORDER BY mu.ProjectCount DESC, mu.AvgQualityRating DESC
    LIMIT 9
)
SELECT tm.MaterialName, tm.ProjectCount, tm.AvgQualityRating, s.SupplierName, s.City, s.Country, GROUP_CONCAT(rp.ProjectName ORDER BY rp.ProjectName) AS ProjectList
FROM TopMaterials tm
JOIN Suppliers s ON tm.SupplierID = s.SupplierID
JOIN Buildings b ON tm.MaterialName = b.Material
JOIN RecentProjects rp ON b.ProjectID = rp.ProjectID
GROUP BY tm.MaterialName, tm.ProjectCount, tm.AvgQualityRating, s.SupplierName, s.City, s.Country
ORDER BY tm.ProjectCount DESC, tm.AvgQualityRating DESC;

    s.SupplierName AS Название_поставщика,

WITH HighBudgetProjects AS (
    SELECT
        ProjectID
    FROM
        Projects
    WHERE
        Budget > 150000000
        AND StartDate >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 2 YEAR)
),
ProjectMaterials AS (
    SELECT
        b.ProjectID,
        b.BuildingID,
        b.Material AS BuildingMaterial
    FROM
        Buildings b
    JOIN HighBudgetProjects hbp ON b.ProjectID = hbp.ProjectID
),
MaterialUsage AS (
    SELECT
        pm.BuildingMaterial,
        COUNT(DISTINCT pm.ProjectID) AS ProjectCount
    FROM
        ProjectMaterials pm
    GROUP BY
        pm.BuildingMaterial
),
MaterialQuality AS (
    SELECT
        m.MaterialName,
        AVG(m.QualityRating) AS AvgQualityRating,
        m.SupplierID
    FROM
        Materials m
    GROUP BY
        m.MaterialName,
        m.SupplierID
),
SupplierDetails AS (
    SELECT
        s.SupplierID,
        s.SupplierName,
        s.City AS SupplierCity,
        s.Country AS SupplierCountry
    FROM
        Suppliers s
)
SELECT
    mu.BuildingMaterial AS Название_материала,
    mu.ProjectCount AS Количество_проектов,
    mq.AvgQualityRating AS Средний_рейтинг_качества,
    sd.SupplierName AS Название_поставщика,
    sd.SupplierCity AS Город_поставщика,
    sd.SupplierCountry AS Страна_поставщика,
    GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT p.ProjectName ORDER BY p.ProjectName SEPARATOR ', ') AS Список_проектов
FROM
    MaterialUsage mu
JOIN ProjectMaterials pm ON mu.BuildingMaterial = pm.BuildingMaterial
JOIN Projects p ON pm.ProjectID = p.ProjectID
JOIN Buildings b ON pm.BuildingID = b.BuildingID
JOIN Materials m ON b.Material = m.MaterialName
JOIN MaterialQuality mq ON m.MaterialName = mq.MaterialName AND m.SupplierID = mq.SupplierID
JOIN SupplierDetails sd ON mq.SupplierID = sd.SupplierID
WHERE p.ProjectID IN (SELECT ProjectID FROM HighBudgetProjects)
GROUP BY
    mu.BuildingMaterial,
    mu.ProjectCount,
    mq.AvgQualityRating,
    sd.SupplierName,
    sd.SupplierCity,
    sd.SupplierCountry
ORDER BY
    mu.ProjectCount DESC
LIMIT 9;

    JOIN Buildings b ON b.Material LIKE CONCAT('%', m.MaterialName, '%')
    JOIN Projects p ON b.ProjectID = p.ProjectID
WHERE 
    p.Budget > 150000000
    AND p.StartDate >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 2 YEAR)
GROUP BY 
    m.MaterialName, s.SupplierName, s.City, s.Country
ORDER BY 
    COUNT(DISTINCT p.ProjectID) DESC, AVG(m.QualityRating) DESC
LIMIT 9;

WITH HighBudgetProjects AS (
    SELECT 
        p.ProjectID, 
        p.ProjectName, 
        p.Budget 
    FROM 
        Projects p 
    WHERE 
        p.Budget > 150000000 
        AND p.EndDate >= CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL 2 YEAR
),
UsedMaterials AS (
    SELECT 
        bm.MaterialID, 
        bm.ProjectID, 
        m.MaterialName, 
        m.QualityRating, 
        s.SupplierName, 
        s.City AS SupplierCity, 
        s.Country AS SupplierCountry 
    FROM 
        Buildings b 
        INNER JOIN Materials m ON b.Material = m.MaterialName 
        INNER JOIN Suppliers s ON m.SupplierID = s.SupplierID 
        INNER JOIN HighBudgetProjects hbp ON b.ProjectID = hbp.ProjectID
),
MaterialSummary AS (
    SELECT 
        um.MaterialName, 
        COUNT(DISTINCT um.ProjectID) AS ProjectCount, 
        AVG(um.QualityRating) AS AverageQualityRating, 
        um.SupplierName, 
        um.SupplierCity, 
        um.SupplierCountry 
    FROM 
        UsedMaterials um 
    GROUP BY 
        um.MaterialName, 
        um.SupplierName, 
        um.SupplierCity, 
        um.SupplierCountry
)
SELECT 
    ms.MaterialName AS Название_материала, 
    ms.ProjectCount AS Количество_проектов, 
    ROUND(ms.AverageQualityRating, 2) AS Средний_рейтинг_качества, 
    ms.SupplierName AS Название_поставщика, 
    ms.SupplierCity AS Город_поставщика, 
    ms.SupplierCountry AS Страна_поставщика, 
    GROUP_CONCAT(hbp.ProjectName SEPARATOR ', ') AS Список_проектов 
FROM 
    MaterialSummary ms 
    LEFT JOIN HighBudgetProjects hbp ON ms.MaterialName IN (SELECT MaterialName FROM UsedMaterials WHERE ProjectID = hbp.ProjectID) 
GROUP BY 
    ms.MaterialName, 
    ms.ProjectCount, 
    ms.AverageQualityRating, 
    ms.SupplierName, 
    ms.SupplierCity, 
    ms.SupplierCountry 
ORDER BY 
    ms.ProjectCount DESC,

LIMIT 9;

queries.question: Какие здания с назначением 'Жилой' или 'Офисы' имеют наилучшее соотношение высоты к количеству этажей и при этом используют высококачественные материалы (рейтинг выше 8)? [Ожидаемые колонки: Название здания, Высота, Количество этажей, Материал, Стиль, Назначение, Высота на этаж, Название проекта, Местоположение, Бюджет, Имя архитектора, Фамилия архитектора, Специализация архитектора, Среднее качество материалов]
queries.sql_query: WITH BuildingMetrics AS (SELECT b.BuildingID, b.BuildingName, b.Height, b.Floors, b.Material, b.Style, b.`Usage`, b.Height / NULLIF(b.Floors, 0) AS HeightPerFloor, p.ProjectID, p.ProjectName, p.Location, p.Budget, p.ArchitectID FROM Buildings b JOIN Projects p ON b.ProjectID = p.ProjectID WHERE b.`Usage` IN ('Жилой', 'Офисы')), MaterialQuality AS (SELECT p.ProjectID, AVG(m.QualityRating) AS AvgMaterialQuality FROM Projects p JOIN Materials m ON TRUE GROUP BY p.ProjectID HAVING AVG(m.QualityRating) > 8) SELECT bm.BuildingName, bm.Height AS Высота, bm.Floors AS Этажи, bm.Material AS Материал, bm.Style AS Стиль, bm.`Usage` AS Назначение, ROUND(bm.HeightPerFloor, 2) AS ВысотаНаЭтаж, bm.ProjectName AS НазваниеПроекта, bm.Location AS Местоположение, bm.Budget AS Бюджет, a.FirstName AS ИмяАрхитектора, a.LastName AS ФамилияАрхитектора, a.Specialization AS СпециализацияАрхитектора, ROUND(mq.AvgMaterialQuality, 2) AS СреднееКачествоМатериалов FROM BuildingMetrics bm JOIN MaterialQuality mq ON bm.ProjectID = mq.ProjectID JOIN Architects a ON bm.ArchitectID = a.ArchitectID ORDER BY bm.HeightPerFloor ASC LIMIT 6;

queries.question: Какие поставщики наиболее эффективно участвуют в проектах по строительству зданий выше 250 метров, предоставляя материалы с наилучшим соотношением цена/качество? Показать топ-5 поставщиков с детализацией по проектам и материалам. [Ожидаемые колонки: Название поставщика, Город, Страна, Количество проектов, Количество материалов, Средний рейтинг качества, Соотношение цена/качество, Список зданий, Список проектов, Список материалов]
queries.sql_query: WITH TallBuildings AS (SELECT b.BuildingID, b.BuildingName, b.Height, b.Material, p.ProjectID, p.ProjectName, p.Budget FROM Buildings b JOIN Projects p ON b.ProjectID = p.ProjectID WHERE b.Height > 250), SupplierMaterials AS (SELECT s.SupplierID, s.SupplierName, s.City, s.Country, m.MaterialID, m.MaterialName, m.QualityRating, m.CostPerUnit, m.CostPerUnit / NULLIF(m.QualityRating, 0) AS PriceQualityRatio FROM Suppliers s JOIN Materials m ON s.SupplierID = m.SupplierID), SupplierProjectParticipation AS (SELECT sm.SupplierID, sm.SupplierName, sm.City, sm.Country, COUNT(DISTINCT tb.ProjectID) AS ProjectCount, COUNT(DISTINCT sm.MaterialID) AS MaterialCount, AVG(sm.QualityRating) AS AvgQuality, AVG(sm.PriceQualityRatio) AS AvgPriceQualityRatio, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT tb.BuildingName SEPARATOR ', ') AS Buildings, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT tb.ProjectName SEPARATOR ', ') AS Projects, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT sm.MaterialName SEPARATOR ', ') AS Materials FROM SupplierMaterials sm CROSS JOIN TallBuildings tb GROUP BY sm.SupplierID, sm.SupplierName, sm.City, sm.Country) SELECT SupplierName AS Поставщик, City AS Город, Country AS Страна, ProjectCount AS КоличествоПроектов, MaterialCount AS КоличествоМатериалов, ROUND(AvgQuality, 2) AS СреднееКачество, ROUND(AvgPriceQualityRatio, 2) AS ЦенаКачествоСоотношение, Buildings AS Здания, Projects AS Проекты, Materials AS Материалы FROM SupplierProjectParticipation WHERE ProjectCount > 0 ORDER BY AvgPriceQualityRatio ASC LIMIT 5;
queries.gpt-4o_response:
WITH BuildingProjects AS (
    SELECT 
        b.BuildingID, 
        b.BuildingName, 
        b.Height, 
        p.ProjectID, 
        p.ProjectName, 
        p.Location, 
        p.Budget
    FROM 
        Buildings b
    JOIN 
        Projects p ON b.ProjectID = p.ProjectID
    WHERE 
        b.Height > 250
),
SupplierMaterials AS (
    SELECT 
        m.MaterialID, 
        m.MaterialName, 
        m.SupplierID, 
        m.CostPerUnit, 
        m.QualityRating, 
        (m.QualityRating / m.CostPerUnit) AS PriceQualityRatio
    FROM 
        Materials m
),
SupplierEfficiency AS (
    SELECT 
        sm.SupplierID, 
        s.SupplierName, 
        s.City, 
        s.Country, 
        COUNT(DISTINCT bp.ProjectID) AS ProjectCount, 
        COUNT(DISTINCT sm.MaterialID) AS MaterialCount, 
        AVG(sm.QualityRating) AS AvgQualityRating, 
        AVG(sm.PriceQualityRatio) AS AvgPriceQualityRatio,
        GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT bp.BuildingName) AS BuildingList,
        GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT bp.ProjectName) AS ProjectList,
        GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT sm.MaterialName) AS MaterialList
    FROM 
        SupplierMaterials sm
    JOIN 
        Suppliers s ON sm.SupplierID = s.SupplierID
    JOIN 
        BuildingProjects bp ON sm.MaterialID IN (
            SELECT m.MaterialID 
            FROM Materials m 
            WHERE m.SupplierID = s.SupplierID
        )
    GROUP BY 
        sm.SupplierID, s.SupplierName, s.City, s.Country
)
SELECT 
    se.SupplierName AS Название_поставщика, 
    se.City AS Город, 
    se.Country AS Страна, 
    se.ProjectCount AS Количество_проектов, 
    se.MaterialCount AS Количество_материалов, 
    se.AvgQualityRating AS Средний_рейтинг_качества, 
    se.AvgPriceQualityRatio AS Соотношение_цена_качество, 
    se.BuildingList AS Список_зданий, 
    se.ProjectList AS Список_проектов, 
    se.MaterialList AS Список_материалов
FROM 
    SupplierEfficiency se
ORDER BY 
    se.AvgPriceQualityRatio DESC
LIMIT 5;

    SELECT 
        sm.SupplierID, 
        sm.SupplierName, 
        sm.City, 
        sm.Country, 
        COUNT(DISTINCT bp.ProjectID) AS ProjectCount, 
        COUNT(DISTINCT sm.MaterialID) AS MaterialCount, 
        AVG(sm.QualityRating) AS AvgQualityRating, 
        CASE WHEN SUM(sm.CostPerUnit) > 0 THEN AVG(sm.QualityRating) / AVG(sm.CostPerUnit) ELSE 0 END AS PriceQualityRatio,
        GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT bp.BuildingName) AS BuildingList,
        GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT bp.ProjectName) AS ProjectList,
        GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT sm.MaterialName) AS MaterialList
    FROM 
        SupplierMaterials sm
    JOIN 
        BuildingProjects bp ON sm.SupplierID = bp.ProjectID
    GROUP BY 
        sm.SupplierID, sm.SupplierName, sm.City, sm.Country
)
SELECT 
    SupplierName, 
    City, 
    Country, 
    ProjectCount, 
    MaterialCount, 
    AvgQualityRating, 
    PriceQualityRatio, 
    BuildingList, 
    ProjectList, 
    MaterialList
FROM 
    SupplierEfficiency
ORDER BY 
    PriceQualityRatio DESC
LIMIT 5;

),
ProjectMaterials AS (

        bp.ProjectID,
        m.MaterialID,
        m.MaterialName,
        m.SupplierID,
        m.CostPerUnit,
        m.QualityRating
    FROM

    JOIN
        Projects p ON bp.ProjectID = p.ProjectID
    JOIN
        Buildings b ON p.ProjectID = b.ProjectID
    LEFT JOIN

),
SupplierProjectMaterials AS (

        s.SupplierID,

        s.City,
        s.Country,
        pm.ProjectID,
        pm.MaterialID,
        pm.CostPerUnit,
        pm.QualityRating,
        pm.BuildingName
    FROM
        Suppliers s
    JOIN
        ProjectMaterials pm ON s.SupplierID = pm.SupplierID
),
AggregatedSupplierData AS (
    SELECT
        spm.SupplierID,
        spm.SupplierName,
        spm.City,
        spm.Country,
        COUNT(DISTINCT spm.ProjectID) AS ProjectCount,
        COUNT(DISTINCT spm.MaterialID) AS MaterialCount,
        AVG(spm.QualityRating) AS AvgQualityRating,
        SUM(spm.CostPerUnit) AS TotalCost,
        AVG(spm.CostPerUnit / spm.QualityRating) AS CostQualityRatio,

        GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT spm.MaterialName) AS MaterialList
    FROM

        mc.SupplierID,
        s.SupplierName,
        s.City,
        s.Country,

        mc.CostPerUnit,
        mc.QualityRating,
        (mc.CostPerUnit / mc.QualityRating) AS PriceQualityRatio
    FROM
        BuildingProjects bp
    JOIN

        GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT p.ProjectName) AS ProjectList,
        GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT pm.MaterialName) AS MaterialList

WITH BuildingSuppliers AS (
  SELECT 
    s.SupplierName, 
    s.City, 
    s.Country, 
    b.ProjectID, 
    b.BuildingName, 
    m.MaterialName, 
    m.CostPerUnit, 
    m.QualityRating
  FROM 
    Suppliers s 
  JOIN 
    Materials m ON s.SupplierID = m.SupplierID 
  JOIN 
    Buildings b ON m.MaterialID IN (SELECT MaterialID FROM Materials WHERE SupplierID = s.SupplierID)
  WHERE 
    b.Height > 250
),
SupplierStats AS (
  SELECT 
    bs.SupplierName, 
    bs.City, 
    bs.Country, 
    COUNT(DISTINCT bs.ProjectID) AS ProjectCount, 
    COUNT(DISTINCT bs.MaterialName) AS MaterialCount, 
    AVG(bs.QualityRating) AS AvgQualityRating, 
    AVG(bs.CostPerUnit) AS AvgCostPerUnit, 
    GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT bs.BuildingName) AS BuildingList, 
    GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT bs.ProjectID) AS ProjectList, 
    GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT bs.MaterialName) AS MaterialList
  FROM 
    BuildingSuppliers bs 
  GROUP BY 
    bs.SupplierName, 
    bs.City, 
    bs.Country
),
SupplierEfficiency AS (
  SELECT 
    ss.SupplierName, 
    ss.City, 
    ss.Country, 
    ss.ProjectCount, 
    ss.MaterialCount, 
    ss.AvgQualityRating, 
    ss.AvgCostPerUnit / ss.AvgQualityRating AS PriceQualityRatio, 
    ss.BuildingList, 
    ss.ProjectList, 
    ss.MaterialList
  FROM 
    SupplierStats ss
)
SELECT 
  se.SupplierName, 
  se.City, 
  se.Country, 
  se.ProjectCount, 
  se.MaterialCount, 
  se.AvgQualityRating, 
  se.PriceQualityRatio, 
  se.BuildingList, 
  se.ProjectList, 
  se.MaterialList
FROM 
  SupplierEfficiency se 
ORDER BY 
  se.PriceQualityRatio DESC 
LIMIT 5;

WITH 
  -- Список зданий выше 250 метров
  TallBuildings AS (
    SELECT b.ProjectID, b.BuildingName, b.Height
    FROM Buildings b
    WHERE b.Height > 250
  ),
  
  -- Список проектов с участием поставщиков
  ProjectSuppliers AS (
    SELECT p.ProjectID, s.SupplierName, s.City, s.Country, m.MaterialName, m.CostPerUnit, m.QualityRating
    FROM Projects p
    JOIN TallBuildings tb ON p.ProjectID = tb.ProjectID
    JOIN Contracts c ON p.ProjectID = c.ProjectID
    JOIN Materials m ON c.ContractID = m.ContractID
    JOIN Suppliers s ON m.SupplierID = s.SupplierID
  ),
  
  -- Рейтинг поставщиков по качеству и цене
  SupplierRating AS (
    SELECT 
      ps.SupplierName, 
      ps.City, 
      ps.Country, 
      COUNT(DISTINCT ps.ProjectID) AS ProjectCount,
      COUNT(DISTINCT ps.MaterialName) AS MaterialCount,
      AVG(ps.QualityRating) AS AvgQuality,
      AVG(ps.CostPerUnit) AS AvgCost,
      AVG(ps.QualityRating / ps.CostPerUnit) AS QualityCostRatio,
      GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ps.BuildingName) AS BuildingList,
      GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ps.ProjectID) AS ProjectList,
      GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ps.MaterialName) AS MaterialList
    FROM ProjectSuppliers ps
    GROUP BY ps.SupplierName, ps.City, ps.Country
  )
  
SELECT 
  sr.SupplierName, 
  sr.City, 
  sr.Country, 
  sr.ProjectCount, 
  sr.MaterialCount, 
  sr.AvgQuality, 
  sr.QualityCostRatio, 
  sr.BuildingList, 
  sr.ProjectList, 
  sr.MaterialList
FROM SupplierRating sr
ORDER BY sr.QualityCostRatio DESC
LIMIT 5;

WITH HighBuildings AS (
    SELECT b.BuildingID, b.BuildingName, b.ProjectID, b.Height, p.ProjectName, p.ArchitectID, p.ClientID
    FROM Buildings b
    JOIN Projects p ON b.ProjectID = p.ProjectID
    WHERE b.Height > 250
),
SupplierMaterials AS (
    SELECT s.SupplierID, s.SupplierName, s.City, s.Country, m.MaterialID, m.MaterialName, m.CostPerUnit, m.QualityRating,
           m.CostPerUnit / NULLIF(m.QualityRating, 0) AS PriceQualityRatio
    FROM Suppliers s
    JOIN Materials m ON s.SupplierID = m.SupplierID
),
ProjectSuppliers AS (
    SELECT hb.ProjectID, hb.ProjectName, hb.BuildingName, sm.SupplierID, sm.SupplierName, sm.City, sm.Country,
           sm.MaterialName, sm.CostPerUnit, sm.QualityRating, sm.PriceQualityRatio
    FROM HighBuildings hb
    JOIN Designs d ON hb.ProjectID = d.ProjectID
    JOIN Architects a ON d.ArchitectID = a.ArchitectID
    JOIN Contracts c ON hb.ProjectID = c.ProjectID
    JOIN SupplierMaterials sm ON 1=1
),
SupplierStats AS (
    SELECT 
        SupplierName,
        City,
        Country,
        COUNT(DISTINCT ProjectID) AS ProjectCount,
        COUNT(DISTINCT MaterialName) AS MaterialCount,
        AVG(QualityRating) AS AvgQualityRating,
        AVG(PriceQualityRatio) AS AvgPriceQualityRatio,
        GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT BuildingName) AS BuildingList,
        GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ProjectName) AS ProjectList,
        GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT MaterialName) AS MaterialList
    FROM ProjectSuppliers
    GROUP BY SupplierName, City, Country
)
SELECT 
    SupplierName AS 'Название поставщика',
    City AS 'Город',
    Country AS 'Страна',
    ProjectCount AS 'Количество проектов',
    MaterialCount AS 'Количество материалов',

    BuildingList AS 'Список зданий',
    ProjectList AS 'Список проектов',
    MaterialList AS 'Список материалов'
FROM SupplierStats
ORDER BY AvgPriceQualityRatio ASC, AvgQualityRating DESC
LIMIT 5;

queries.gigachat_response:
WITH TallBuildings AS (
    SELECT *
    FROM Buildings
    WHERE Height > 250
),
RelevantProjects AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT tb.BuildingID, pr.*
    FROM TallBuildings tb
    INNER JOIN Projects pr ON tb.ProjectID = pr.ProjectID
),
EffectiveSuppliers AS (
    SELECT ms.SupplierID, ms.SupplierName, ms.City, ms.Country, COUNT(DISTINCT rp.ProjectID) AS NumProjects,
           COUNT(DISTINCT mat.MaterialID) AS NumMaterials, AVG(mat.QualityRating) AS AverageQualityRating,
           AVG(mat.CostPerUnit / mat.QualityRating) AS PriceToQualityRatio,
           GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT tb.BuildingName SEPARATOR ', ') AS ListOfBuildings,
           GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT rp.ProjectName SEPARATOR ', ') AS ListOfProjects,
           GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT mat.MaterialName SEPARATOR ', ') AS ListOfMaterials
    FROM RelevantProjects rp
    INNER JOIN Buildings tb ON rp.BuildingID = tb.BuildingID
    INNER JOIN Materials mat ON mat.SupplierID = rp.ClientID -- Assuming supplier provides materials directly related to projects
    INNER JOIN Suppliers ms ON mat.SupplierID = ms.SupplierID
    GROUP BY ms.SupplierID, ms.SupplierName, ms.City, ms.Country
)
SELECT es.SupplierName, es.City, es.Country, es.NumProjects, es.NumMaterials, es.AverageQualityRating, es.PriceToQualityRatio, es.ListOfBuildings, es.ListOfProjects, es.ListOfMaterials
FROM EffectiveSuppliers es
ORDER BY es.PriceToQualityRatio ASC
LIMIT 5;
queries.gigachat_response_ru:
WITH HighRiseProjects AS (
    SELECT 
        b.BuildingID, 
        b.Height, 
        b.ProjectID, 
        p.ClientID
    FROM 
        Buildings b 
    INNER JOIN 
        Projects p ON b.ProjectID = p.ProjectID
    WHERE 
        b.Height > 250
),
EffectiveSuppliers AS (
    SELECT 
        s.SupplierID, 
        s.SupplierName, 
        s.City, 
        s.Country, 
        COUNT(DISTINCT hrp.ProjectID) AS NumProjects, 
        COUNT(DISTINCT m.MaterialID) AS NumMaterials, 
        AVG(m.QualityRating) AS AverageQualityRating, 
        AVG(m.CostPerUnit / m.QualityRating) AS PriceToQualityRatio
    FROM 
        Suppliers s 
    INNER JOIN 
        Materials m ON s.SupplierID = m.SupplierID
    INNER JOIN 
        HighRiseProjects hrp ON m.MaterialID > 0 -- Связываем через наличие материала в проекте
    GROUP BY 
        s.SupplierID, 
        s.SupplierName, 
        s.City, 
        s.Country
)
SELECT 
    es.SupplierName AS Название_поставщика, 
    es.City AS Город, 
    es.Country AS Страна, 
    es.NumProjects AS Количество_проектов, 
    es.NumMaterials AS Количество_материалов, 
    es.AverageQualityRating AS Средний_рейтинг_качества, 
    es.PriceToQualityRatio AS Соотношение_цена_качество,
    GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT b.BuildingName SEPARATOR ', ') AS Список_зданий,
    GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT p.ProjectName SEPARATOR ', ') AS Список_проектов,
    GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT m.MaterialName SEPARATOR ', ') AS Список_материалов
FROM 
    EffectiveSuppliers es 
INNER JOIN 
    Materials m ON es.SupplierID = m.SupplierID
INNER JOIN 
    HighRiseProjects hrp ON m.MaterialID > 0 -- Связываем через материал
INNER JOIN 
    Buildings b ON hrp.BuildingID = b.BuildingID
INNER JOIN 
    Projects p ON hrp.ProjectID = p.ProjectID
GROUP BY 
    es.SupplierID, 
    es.SupplierName, 
    es.City, 
    es.Country, 
    es.NumProjects, 
    es.NumMaterials, 
    es.AverageQualityRating, 
    es.PriceToQualityRatio
ORDER BY 
    es.PriceToQualityRatio ASC
LIMIT 5;
